du chud pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin no/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gi rgyu las byung ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
na| 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni zab ste/ brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang / mdzangs pas rig pa'o/ /'jam dpal/ chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du rnams kyis thos par mi 'gyur te/ gang dag gis thos kyang dad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di la gang lus mngon sum du 'gyur ba dang / gang dge
ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa de dag gis thos par 'gyur 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bzod pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ chos kyi tshul 'di la ma brten par sangs
rgyas pa gang yang med do/ /'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma rnyed po de dag thams cad kyang
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /'jam dpal/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma brten par byang chub 'dod pa de dag ni nam mkha' la rnyeb
pas rnyeb par rig par bya'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma brten par rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa'ang thob par mi nus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta smos
kyang ci dgos/ nga'i nyan thos gang gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par grol ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa de dag kyang chos kyi tshul
'di la brten nas so/ /'jam dpal/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas ngan du bsams te ngan song du skye ba ni sla yi/ gtan gzhan rnams la dad par byas te mtho ris su skye ba ni de lta
ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ gang tshul 'di thos nas sems can dmyal bar skyes pa de dag ni rab tu myur bar rnam par thar par gyur te/ mtho ris su skyes pa de dag ni de
lta ma yin no/ /'jam dpal/ chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpas tshul 'di thos par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ des sngon yang tshul 'di thos par gyur la/ thos nas
kyang rjes su yi rang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen pos brtan par 'gyur pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ba dang / thos pa dang / tshul khrims phun sum
tshogs par 'gyur ba ste/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na tshul 'di thos par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa'
chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul 'di thos par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul 'di ni yid la byed pa la rab tu brtson par 'gyur pa dang / las kyis 'jigs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba
dang / smon lam btab par 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin gyis drang zhing mnyen la 'grogs na bde bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan
na tshul 'di thos par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul 'di thos nas spong bar mi 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub tu smon
lam btab pa yin/ bzod pa thob pa yin/ lta ba yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin te/ chos bzhi
po de dag dang ldan na/ tshul 'di thos nas spong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul 'di thos nas dad par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa phun sum
tshogs pa yin/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yin/ stong pa nyid kyi bsam gtan pa yin/ gzungs thob pa yin te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na tshul 'di thos nas dad
par 'gyur ro/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul 'di thos nas rab tu rtogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa yin/ thos pa'i tshogs bsags
pa yin/ ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyis sems las su rung ba yin te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na tshul 'di thos nas rab tu rtogs
par 'gyur ro/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul 'di thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs
thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang / tshul thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshul du thos pa dang / 'dod pa thams cad dang bral te chad na sangs rgyas kyi
byang chub 'dod par 'gyur ba'ang med pa dang / snying rje chen po las kyang rnam par mi ldag pa ste/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/ /'jam dpal/ de bas na byang chub sems dpas tshul 'di rgyun mi 'chad par mnyen par bya'o/ /myur du nges par 'byung bar 'dod
pas kyang tshul 'di mnyan par bya'o/ /lung bstan pa'i sa 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas kyang tshul 'di mnyan par bya'o/ /las kyi sgrib pa byang bar 'dod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i
sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / 'gro ba'i sgrib pa byang bar 'dod pas kyang tshul 'di mnyan par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la bla na med pa'i mchod pa byed par 'dod pas
kyang tshul 'di mnyan par bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar 'dod pas kyang tshul 'di nyid mnyan par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ gang chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas 'jug pa dang / mi
spong ba dang / mi smod par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rtsom pa med kyis de'i tshe mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba mgul nas bkrol te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor nas tshig /'di skad
du| bcom ldan 'das/ sbyin pa'i chos 'dis sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur cig
ces smras so/ /de nas mu tig gi do shal de bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad na khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bkra ba/ gru bzhi lham pa/ lha dang / mis lta bar byed
pa| nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ma thos pa 'dug par
gyur te/ de bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i rjes su 'gro zhing bzhugs pa'i rjes su gnas so/ /de'i tshe lha dang / mi phal cher ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur te/ ya
mtshan du bya ba skyes nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas mig mi 'dzum par gnas par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rtsom pa med ngo mtshar du gyur nas dga' ba skyes te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
la gtugs nas phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par
bstod do/ /yon tan mang po kun gyi snod gyur pa/ /sa dang lha yul 'gro ba'i mgon gcig pu/ /bde gshegs shi zhing rab tu zhi la dgyes/ /khyod mtshungs 'jig rten ma mchis
ga la lhag /blo gros mnyam zhing g.yo med mtshungs par sbyor/ /bdag po thugs rjes rab tu zin pa'i thugs/ /nam mkha'i dkyil ltar thugs ni ma gos te/ /phan ran yang dag bka'
mchid gsung zhing spyod/ /khyod la dgra dang zun ni mi mnga' ste/ /bdag po dgyes dang mi dgyes yong mi mnga'/ /sman pa bzhin du 'gro ba gso mdzad cing / /thugs rje bskyed nas
rnam par mi rtog spyod/ /lha min lha dang klu dang nam mkha' lding / /gnod sbyin khyod la skyabs mchis zhi ba thob/ /mgon po srid pa gsum na phan mdzad pa/ /thub pa khyod la
bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /bde gshegs khyod ni 'dus ma bgyis mi gzigs/ /zhi thugs zhi la'ang yon tan mi gzigs te/ /gnyis ka'i tshul spangs rnam rtog mi mnga'
bar| |bdag po mya ngan 'das nas 'jig rten spyod/ /rab zhi'i yon tan rgya mtsho gting tshod yas/ /stobs bcu nyid du yon tan mkhyen par 'gyur/ /sa dang nam mkha' lta bur
tshad med chos/ /dgon la thal mo sbyar te mgos phyag 'tshal/ /srid pa'i chu bor mi rkyal mi nub cing / /sems can mchog ni mi khyer ma bzhugs
so| |khyod ni gcig pu srid mtsho'i pha rol gshegs/ /dpe med rgya mtsho'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+ma bzhin du chu yis mi gos pa/ /sa la 'jig rten chos grol rab
tu gsung / /khyod kyi mkhyen pa su dang mi mtshungs te/ /mtshungs med blo gros khyod la bdag skyabs mchi/ /khyod ni mi mkhyen cung zad 'dir mi mnga'/ /stobs bcu ldan
pas kun tu yong mi bsnyengs/ /'khor la nga 'dra su'ang med ces gsung / /de slad khyod ni dpa' bo gcig pu rgyu/ /mi gang khyod bka' bdud rtsi snod gyur pa/ /de dag
mdor na srid pa'i 'jigs dang bral/ /sman pa dam pa mchod 'os 'jig rten mgon/ /thugs rje ldan pa khyod la bdag skyabs mchi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang
chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen te/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni bdag gi slad du
mchod pa mi bgyid kyi/ gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mu tig gi do shal phul zhing bstod pa dang /
mchod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas nyid thob par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni bdag gi bsam pa lags so/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad
pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das sgo zhal gyi nas 'od zer kha dog tha dad pa kha dog du ma/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod kha dang / shel gyi
kha dog lta bu byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa 'od kyis snang bar byas nas ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi gdung ba'ang rab tu zhi
bar byas/ lha dang / mi rnams kyang sim par byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan du mar bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to//
'od zer de dag mthong ba'i 'khor de thams cad kyang yid 'dun cing rab tu dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
lus btud nas 'dug te/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ci yin snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dang
gis bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa/ dpa' chen khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad pas/ /lha dang mir bcas 'jig rten 'di/ /khyod kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa
la| |the tshom 'tshal nas lta zhing mchis/ /'dod chags bral ba dpa' bo khyod/ /thams cad mkhyen pa rnam par 'dren/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad/ /skyon mi mnga'
ba 'dzum don gsungs/ /thub pa'i zhal nas 'od btang ba/ /gsal zhing dag la yid du mchi/ /lha mi ngan song mchis pa rnams/ /de yis reg pas bde bar gyur/ /sems
can chen po khyod zhal nas/ /'od zer dag ni rab btang ba/ /de ni ci zhig don du bstan/ /thugs rje can gyis lung bstan gsol/ /'od zer kha dog dkar po dag /tshems kyi
phrag nas mdzes byung ba/ /de dag gis ni nyi ma'i zer/ /shin tu mdzes par shar ba dag /gang slad 'jig rten dgar 'gyur ba/ /deng du snag tsha'i mdog bzhin bgyis/ /
mgon khyod gang la thugs rje zhing / /su yi bskal pa nye bar gnas/ /rgyu dang don ni ma mchis par/ /'dod chags bral ba 'dzum mi mdzad/ /thugs rje thugs kyis lung ston
te| |the tshom rnam par bsal bar mdzod/ /ji ltar khyod kyi zhal nas su/ /'od zer byung nas slar log ste/ /'od ni 'jig rten mgon po yi/ /dbu yi gtsug tu nub gyur
pa| |glog ris bzhin du nam mkha' la/ /dge ba dpag med bkra bgyid pa/ /rnam par 'dren pa de dag gis/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med pa 'di bskal pa bcu gnyis na/ lhas
mngon par bstod pa'i bskal pa la dga' ba chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro/ /kun dga'
bo| |de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen po'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa gcig thub par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu gnyis thub par
'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang kun spyod pa ltar/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can rnams kyi
longs spyod pa dang / kun spyod pa'ang de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom
pa med la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /byang chub
sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di la su zhig sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni gang
sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ gal te gang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi
mthong na khyod sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar lung bstan to zhes bya ba de mi bsting ngam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes
lung ma bstan tam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ don yongs su mkhyen pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs
pa'i don yongs su mkhyen pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub tu smon pa de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung mi ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang byang
chub tu mi smon pa de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung ston to/ /de bas na don yongs su mkhyen pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir
'di skad du/ sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes gsungs na/ khyod ci zhig la ltos bsams nas/ 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes smra/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
nyan thos kyi tha snyad 'di ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad do/ /smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'phags pa rnams la 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags
pa tha snyad 'dogs pa ni bden pa'o/ /'jig rten tha snyad 'dogs pa ni log pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bas na 'jig rten gyi tha snyad log pa 'phags pa rnams la brjod par mi
'os so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'jig rten ni bsrung bar bya ba yin te/ don dam pas dngangs su 'ong zhes de la 'phags pa rnams snying rje chen pos bden pa yang dag pa btang
nas byis pa rnams la log par tha snyad 'dogs kyi 'phags pa rnams la ma yin te/ 'phags pa rnams ni bden pa yang dag pa la dga' ba'o zhes 'phags pa rnams la bden
pa brjod do/ /'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa gang zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ shin tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa'o/ /chos thams
cad ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin te/ 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa'o/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / kun
'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa dang / bden pa bzhi med dam/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun pa
rab 'byor/ sdug bsngal 'dus byas ma yin nam/ smras pa/ de de bzhin te/ sdug bsngal ni 'dus byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab
'byor/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus byas thams cad rdzun pa slu ba'i chos so zhes ma gsungs sam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med
kyis smras pa/ gal te sdug bsngal ni 'dus byas te de rdzun pa yin na/ khyod 'di ltar ci zhig las sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o snyam du sems/ rab 'byor gyis smras
pa| rigs kyi bu/ sdug bsngal ni 'dus byas te rdzun pa'o/ /sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa ni bden pa'o/ /smras pa/ gal te sdug bsngal ni 'dus byas rdzun pa slu ba'i chos
can te yang dag pa ma yin na de yongs su shes pa'ang bden par rung ngam| rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras
pa| btsun pa rab 'byor/ khyod kyi sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa 'phags pa'i bden par ga la 'gyur/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'gog pa ni 'dus ma byas pa
yin na/ de ci'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden par mi 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ ci 'gog pa de nyid 'gog pa'i bden pa'am
'on te chos gzhan 'ga' zhig 'gags pa lags sam/ ci zhig 'gags pas 'gog pa'i bden par yid ches/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sdug bsngal
'gog pas 'gog pa'i bden pa zhes brjod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis sdug bsngal ni 'dus byas te/ rdzun pa slu
ba'i chos so zhes ma smras sam/ rab 'byor gyi smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ chos gang rdzun
pa yang dag par ma yin pa de la ni 'gog pa med na khyod kyi sdug bsngal de 'gog par ga la 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyi spobs pa la bdag rjes su yi rang ngo / /sems can thams cad kyis kyang khyod kyi
spobs pa thob par gyur cig /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa ni gang / bden pa mngon par rtogs pa ni gang / byang chub
sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni bden pa'i tshul dang 'gal ba ma yin no/ /de ba na chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa
ni bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mngon par rtogs pa ni bden pa
mngon par rtogs pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ stong pa nyid khong du chud pa ni bden pa'o/ /stong pa nyid mngon par rtogs pa ni bden par mngon par rtogs pa'o/ /
chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa ste/ mi skye ba khong du chud pa ni bden pa'o/ /mi skye ba mngon par rtogs pa ni bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang du bden
pa mngon par rtogs pa de la chos gang yang sgrub pa'am spang ba med do/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa ni chos gang
yang mngon par mi sgrub ste/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ bden pa bden
pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'gyur ba med pa'i chos kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ ci tsam du rtog pa de tsam du log pa ste/ rtog pa dang bral ba ni thar pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/
gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pas khyod rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes smras pa ni/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang dag rnyed pa legs par
rnyed pa de dag la ni lung mi ston to/ /gang dag rnyed pa legs par ma rnyed cing rnyed pa med pa de dag la ni lung ston to/ /gang dag rnyed pas dga' bar mi sems shing ma rnyed pas
sro shi bar mi 'gyur ba de dag la lung ston to/ /gang dag 'khor ba las kyang mi g.yo la mya ngan las 'das pa'ang thob par 'gyur ba de dag la lung ston to/ /gang dag so so'i skye
bo'i chos rnams las kyang mi g.yo la nges par gyur pa'ang thob par 'gyur ba de dag la lung ston to/ /gang dag lung bstan pa thos na dga' bar mi sems pa de dag la lung ston to/ /
rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis khong du chud pa 'di zab bo/ /smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang dag rtogs pas khong du chud pa mthong ba de dag gi khong du chud pa
zab bo| /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ khong du chud pa 'di blta dka'o/ /smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ lta 'dod pa rnams kyis so/ /rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ khong du chud pa 'di
rtogs par dka'o/ /smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ mi brtson pa rnams kyis so/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ tshul 'di la su zhig 'jug par 'gyur/ smras
pa| gang dag sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas byung ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa rnams kyi rna
lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin/ smras pa/ gang sgrub pa sten pa'o/
smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sgrub pa la gnas pa ji ltar rig par bya/ smras pa/ gang sems can rnams la log par mi sgrub pa'o/ /smras pa/ sems can rnams la log par mi
sgrub pa ji lta bu/ smras pa/ gang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po mi 'dor ba'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa chen po gang /
smras pa/ gang lus dang / srog dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la byin yang lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'o/ /smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi snying rje chen po gang / smras pa/ gang thog ma kho nar sems can rnams byang chub par 'dod kyi bdag ni ma yin no/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags bdun khri drug stong ni bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /dge slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/ /yang de'i tshe lha'i bu bzang sems zhes bya ba
'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rtsa
ba'i rten gyi gnas gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rtsa ba'i rten gyi gnas ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i sems
bskyed pa'o/ /lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i spyod yul gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang sbyin pa'ang spyod
yul la rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ tshul khrims ma nyams pa'ang spyod yul la rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul khrims la'ang mngon du phyogs pa
yin| bzod pa'ang spyod yul la mi gnyis pa'i chos la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyang spyod yul la brtsam pa med pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ bsam
gtan yang spyod yul la shin tu snyoms par zhugs pa'i chos thams cad la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ shes rab kyang spyod yul la spros pa med pa la'ang mngon du phyogs
pa yin/ thos pa yongs su tshol ba la'ang spyod yul la brjod du med pa'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ zhi gnas kyang spyod yul la shin tu zhi ba dang /
rab tu zhi ba la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ lhag mthong yang spyod yul la chos thams cad bstan du med pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'ang spyod
yul la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba'ang spyod yul la mngon par 'du mi byed pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'ang spyod yul la smon pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ dbang po'ang spyod yul la dbang po las 'das pa'i chos rnams
la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ stobs kyang spyod yul la dbyer med pa'i chos la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag kyang spyod yul la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
la mngon du phyogs pa yin/ lam yang spyod yul la lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can yongs su bskyab pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ sems can yongs su smin
par bya ba'ang spyod yul la chos thams cad la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ 'dul ba'ang spyod yul la chos thams cad shin tu dul bar bsgom pa la'ang mngon du phyogs
pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa'ang spyod yul la pha rol dang / tshu rol la mi chags pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ 'khor ba'ang spyod yul la mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mngon
du phyogs pa yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang spyod yul la mngon par 'du byed pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ skye ba'ang spyod yul la ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba'ang mngon
du phyogs pa yin/ phung po'ang spyod yul la nyon mongs pa med pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ khams kyang spyod yul la dbyer med pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ skye
mched kyang spyod yul la 'phags pa'i skye mched la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ chos nyan pa'ang spyod yul la nges par sems pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ chos ston pa'ang
spyod yul la brjod du med pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ gzugs kyi sku rnam par sgrub pa'ang spyod yul la chos kyi sku la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ chos kyi 'khor lo
rab tu bskor ba'ang spyod yul la 'jug pa med pa dang / ldog pa med pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ nyan thos kyang spyod yul la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la'ang mngon du
phyogs pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyang spyod yul la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin te/ lha'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
yul zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
bdag bde ba la mi lta ba dang / sems can gzhan bde ba la gtong ba dang / 'khor ba na gnas shing tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / bag yod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa
la gnas shing snying rje chen po las phyir mi ldog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa lag mthil du 'ongs kyang thob par mi byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
'khor ba nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / sems can thams cad rjes su srung ba dang / sems can thams cad la dad pa mtshungs pa dang / sems can thams cad mtshungs par
dad par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la bsam pa mtshungs pa dang / 'ged pa'i rang bzhin can dang / zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa dang / rung ba la tshod shes pa
dang | dben pa la mngon par dga' zhing tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / skye bo mang po'i drung du gnas shing chos yang dag par ston pa la snyom las med pa dang / grong
dang / grong khyer du zhugs nas byams pa la mngon par phyogs pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la mngon par mi dga' ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du 'dzi las 'byol ba dang /
rigs pa dang bcas shing snyan pa dang / 'jam por smra ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun rnams la dngos po thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal ba dang / gsong por smra ba
dang | khro gnyer med pa dang / rtag tu gzhan gyi don la dga' ba dang / thams cad du sems chags pa med pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba dang / /
'phags pa'i skye bo dang 'grogs pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnam par spong ba dang / sangs rgyas la bdag nyid tsam du phangs par sems pa dang / chos la srog tsam du
gces par 'dzin pa dang / sgrub pa la yan lag gi dam pa mgo tsam du gces par sems pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang /
yo byad ngan don gyis cho ga par sems pa dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po rnams la ston pa tsam du phangs par sems shing srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtong ba dang / lung
nod pa dang / kha don la brtson pa dang / nam gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par
'jug pa mngon du byed pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams tshul bzhin so sor rtog pa dang / shes rab kyis rab tu rtogs par byed pa dang / sems la rnyog pa med pa dang /
bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / nang du so sor rtog pa dang / phyi rol tu mi rgyug pa dang / lus yongs su gtong ba dang / zhe sdang rnam par spong ba
dang | gti mug rnam par 'jom pa dang / shes rab 'bar bar byed pa dang / so sor thar pa'i sdom pa dang / dul ba las phyir mi 'da' ba dang / thams cad du sems can shes
pa dang / thams cad du shes bzhin dang ldan pa dang / sems phyin ci ma log pa dang / sems dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba dang / rtag tu pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la rab tu
brtson pa dang / brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / rtag tu dge ba gang yin tshol zhing ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams chud mi gzon pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par rab tu ston pa
dang | sems zang zing med pa dang / rtag tu dbang po bsdams pa dang / rtag tu sems mnyam par bzhag pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba dang / 'khor ba mi gtong ba
dang | rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis mi sgul pa dang / thams cad du tshod shes pa dang / thams
cad du dran pa nye bar gzhog pa dang / sbyin pas longs spyod che ba dang / tshul khrims kyis lha dang / mir skyes dang / bzod pas mdzes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis nyon mongs pa yongs
su 'dor ba dang / bsam gtan rnams kyis sems las su rung ba dang / shes rab kyis 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams rab tu rtogs pa dang / bsdu ba'i
dngos po rnams kyis kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams kyis dul ba dang / bden pa dang / gtong ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs rnams
kyis sems shin tu dul ba dang / bsam gtan rnams kyis sems yid du 'ong ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis zab pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba
bzhin du yongs su shes pa dang / stong pa nyid sgom pas lta ba dang bral ba dang / mtshan ma med pa sgom pas rnam par mi rtog pa dang / smon pa med pa sgom pas yongs su 'dzin pa med pa
dang | pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pas theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la gtod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa
bcu po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su skong ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su tshol bas yon tan thams cad skye ba'i sgo dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po
dang | bla ma la sri zhu byed pas sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed pa dang / rang gi lus dang / sems yongs su shes pas thams cad shes pa nyid dang / nga rgyal med pas gzi brjid
dang ldan pa dang / sems can thams cad la bdud cing phyag 'tshal bas spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dang / cho ma cho dgu byin pas mtshan yongs su rdzogs
pa dang / sems can thams cad dang mthun par 'jug pas dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po yang dag par rab tu ston pas cang shes pa'i sa dang / byang chub
kyi sems yang dag par rab tu ston pas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang / stong pa nyid rab tu ston pas bag chags yang dag par 'joms pa dang / chos byin pas so so yang dag par rig
pa thob pa dang / dran pa rab tu byin pas gzungs thob pa dang / chos khong du chud pas spobs pa thob pa dang / spobs pa nye bar bsgrub pas phyad par lung ston pa dang / nyam chung ba rnams
la bzod pas srid med kyi bu'i lus thob pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams la bzod pas mthong ma thag tu sems can thams cad dang par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan dag gis gnod
sems rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa mngon par shes par 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rab tu bzhin pas 'doms kyi
spa ba spubs su nub pa dang / spyod lam yang dag par rab tu byin pas kun tu mdzes pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sbyor bas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang
nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang 'grogs pa dang / 'dod pa yongs su gtong bas 'jig rten thams cad yid ches pa dang / khro ba yongs su 'dor bas 'jig rten thams cad dga' ba
dang | phrag dog yongs su 'dor bas rnyed pa thams cad kyi mchog dang / grags pa'i mchog dang / gnas byin pas 'jig rten thams cad rton pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs
su bcad pa rab tu byin pas chos la rab tu dga' ba dang / grags pa'i sgra dang / gsong por smra bas ngag yongs su dag pa dang / snyan par smra bas tshangs pa'i sgra dang / 'jam por smra bas
bya ka la ping+ka'i sgra skad dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten thams cad du grags pa dang / sems can thams cad la mi slu bas dbang gcig por 'gyur ba dang / ltung ba mi
gleng bas mngal gyi gnas las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / srog gcod pa spong pas tshe dpag tu med pa dang / rkun po yongs su spong bas nam mkha'i mdzod dang / sdug pa'i dngos po
yongs su gtong bas lag na rin po che dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bas longs spyod mi zad pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa yongs su spong bas skyes bu chen po dang / brdzun
du smra ba yongs su spong bas ngag gi gsang ba thob pa dang / phra ma yongs su spongs bas 'jig rten thams cad kyi ston pa dang / ngag rtsub po yongs su spong bas 'jig rten gyis bstod pa'i
snod dang / tshig kyal pa mi smra bas g.yog mi phyed pa dang / brnab sems yongs su spong bas gter chen po rnyed pa dang / gnod sems yongs su spong
bas stegs su gyur pa dang / log par lta ba yongs su spong bas 'jig rten thams cad rton pa dang / chos rgya chen po la sbyor bas stobs bcu nyid dang / sbyin pa thams cad kyi rnam
par smin pa la mi re bas sangs rgyas kyi chos phyir mi ldog pa thob pa dang / kun tu 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su gtong bas mi 'jigs pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas bskal pa'ang //
bskal pa las lhag par byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga bstan kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis cho ga tshad med de/ 'di ni byang chub sems
dpa'i cho ga zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na cho ga dang / spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de ltar cho ga dang / spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni
sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rnyed par dka' ba'i 'du shes can ma yin no/ /lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes bzhin
dang ldan pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ gang byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ting nge 'dzin mi 'dor la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis kyang mi
skye ba dang / ting nge 'dzin las log nas gang du sems can gyi don bya ba der skye ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' she bzhin dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu
bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dpen pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
gang thams cad de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos kyi dbyings su mthong ba de skye bo mang po'i nang du song yang dben par shes par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na byang
chub sems dpa' dben pa zhes bya'o/ /gang gnyis la blo mi 'jug pa de ni shin tu dben pa zhe bya'o/ /lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang
chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' yid kyis smon pa thams cad bral zhing chos gang
yang gzung par ram/ spang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ da gang dang / gang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de dang / de stong pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin par mthong ba ste/ lha'i
bu| de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya'o/ lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
du 'gro ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpas gang bdag dang / sems can thams cad stong pa nyid du
mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong pa'o/ /lha'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dul ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang rnam par rtog par rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa'o/ lha'i bu bzang
sems kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar na zhi ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba
de zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i byang
chub ni rang gi kha na las pa lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni ji lta ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su spong ba de lta de lta sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su
'dzin to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang nas kyang blang ba ma lags/ gang du'ang bkur ba ma lags so/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad la ye
shes rnam par dag pa ni byang chub ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bzod pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ni byang chub kyi spyod pa lags so/ /gang 'di ltar shes pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa lags
so| |bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag mnyam pa nyid 'di la zhugs pa de dang / de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa lags so/ /gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid 'di la
bsten pa de dang / de dag ni tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa lags so/ /gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid 'di nyid la bzod pa de dang / de dag ni bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa lags so/ /gang
dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la thos pa dang / sems pa dang / bsgom pa la brtson pa de dang / de dag ni brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa lags so/ /gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid
'di la nges par rtog pa de dang / de dag ni bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa lags so/ /gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid 'di rnam par dpyod pa de dang / de dag ni shes rab dang ldan pa lags
so| |bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gang dad pa rnyed pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo / /de dag gis chos mngon sum du bgyis so/ /bcom ldan 'das
de dag gis 'dud btul to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu ston pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba lags so/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khong du chud par de dag chos rtogs pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu bzang
sems la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzang sems/ legs so/ legs so/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ bzang sems/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byang chub ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las rab tu bstan to/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs
pa de thams cad kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur ba de dag ni rnyed pa chen po 'byor bar
'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi lag tu song ba de dag ni chos kyi gter chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su 'dzin pa de dang
de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas yid brtan pa'o/ /de dang / de dag ni gsang ba 'dzin pa'o/ /de dang / de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod par
byed pa'o/ /de dag ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos shing thos nas kyang mos pa de dang / de dag ni/ lha'i bu/ nga la lan du phan 'dogs
pa'o| |lha'i bu/ de dag ni phyogs thams cad du mun pa med par byed par 'gyur pa'o/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ khyed las su dag phyi
ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par su spro/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni slad ba'i dus na
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad par spro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rtsom pa mang pos ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par rngo mi thogs so/ /bdag ni sems 'dzin
ba ma mchis/ rtsom pha ma mchis shing sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa ste/ zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams
cad la re ba ma mchis pas chos zab mo la bzod pa 'di yang dag par bshad par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la gnas pas ni dam
pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par rngo mi thogs pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / bris te glegs bam du bgyis nas 'chang bar 'gyur ba de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das
byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyi byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs
kyi bu/ legs so/ les so/ /sems de 'dra bas dam pa'i chos yongs so gzung bar nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ gang snying rje chen po dang ma bral ba des dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par rdo thogs so/ /bdag ni snying rje chen po la dmigs nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad
par bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byams pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rngo thogs so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe
na| gnod sems mang po la dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni byams pa'i sems kyi sa rnam grangs 'di bshad par
bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong na dgas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can rnams kyis mthong na ngoms par mi 'gyur ba
des dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par rngo thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can thams cad la khong khro ba ma mchis pa'i sems kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gzung
par 'gyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can rnams kyi don du sdug bsngal thams cad la spro ba dang /
gang sems can rnams sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par bsgrub par 'tshal zhing sems can thams cad bsgral nas slad kyis bdag brgal bar 'tshal ba de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
'dzin par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par bsgrub par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can
thams cad bsgral slad kyis bdag rgal bar 'tshal lo/ /bsgral bar bgyi ba dang / sgrol ba po dang / bsgral ba'ang ma dmigs par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de lta bu'i
sems dang ldan pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzungs bar bgyi'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'di ltar bdag gis dam pa'i chos
yongs su gzung ngo snyam pa 'di ni 'jig rten gyi phyin log go/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpas ni re zhig bdag nyid dul bar bgyi/ bdag nyid zhi bar bgyi'o/ /
bdag nyid dul zhing zhi la nye bar zhi nas chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar rngo thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni bdag
nyid dul zhing zhi ba la nye bar zhi nas chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos
yongs su zin pa de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa dang / 'di ltar khyed cag sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung
bar spro ba ni legs so/ /legs so/ /'di ni khyod dang 'tsham mo/ /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos so/ /byang chub
sems dpa' rtag tu dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la brtson par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu dag /chos yang dag par brjod pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung
ba dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni skye ba med pa/ 'gag pa med pa'i sku ni chos kyi sku'o/ /chos kyi sku ni
sangs rgyas kyi sku'o zhes sangs rgyas la snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad ni ma byas pa 'dus ma byas pa'o zhes chos la snang ba chen po thob 'gyur ro/ /nga yi
pa med pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma'i dge 'dun no zhes dge 'dun la snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po ni byang chub
sems dpa'i bslab pa'i rtsa ba'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /nges pa'i tshig thams cad ni skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes spobs
pa'i snang ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas dang / brgya byin gyi gnas dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i gnas
su spyod par 'gyur/ de'i 'og tu dzam+bu'i gling du spyod par 'gyur te/ sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpas yongs su gzung bar
'gyur ba/ drang ba/ g.yo med pa/ des pa/ chos zab mo la mos pa de dag gi lag tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems
dpa' rtsom pa med dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par gnon dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa stong phrag brgya
ba'i mdo las/ rtsom pa med kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI gar+b+ha dang / bi dza ya shI la dang / shI len+d+ra
pho d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ da sha tsakra k+Shi ti
gaR+b+ha nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'dus pa chen po las sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang
chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri kha la de ya zhes bya ba drang srong thub pa mang po'i spyod
yul gyi gnas na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po sha stag go /
gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs gcig pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po sha stag
ste| zla ba'i snying po zhes bya ba bshad ma thag tu/ de'i tshe lho phyogs nas bsung gi sprin chen po 'dus pa las bsung gi char chen po rab tu 'bab bo/ /me tog gi sprin
chen po 'dus pa las me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bab po/ /rin po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las rin po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi char chen po rab tu 'bab
po| |lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las lha rdzas kyi gos kyi char chen po rab tu 'bab po/ /de lta bu'i sprin dang / char chen pos drang srong thub pa mang po'i spyod yul gyi gnas
kyi ri de la khyab par gyur to/ /bsung dang / me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / gos de dag las chos chen po'i sgra dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong snyed grags par gyur pa
ni| 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro ba'i sgra dang / bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa'i sgra dang / ngang des shing bzod pa can gyi sgra dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i sgra dang /
bdud bzhi btul ba'i sgra dang / shes rab la gzhol zhing 'jug pa'i sgra dang / grags pa chen pos 'jig rten gsum du rgya cher grags pa'i sgra dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
dang | gzungs kyi khyad par la nan tan bya ba'i sgra dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'dod chags kyis yongs su skyo ba'i sgra dang / gzugs
mi chu'i lbu ba lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang / tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang / 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang / 'du byed ni chu shing lta bu'o zhes
pa'i sgra dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang / mi rtag pa'i sgra dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sgra dang / bdag med pa'i sgra dang /

stong pa'i sgra dang / 'dzem pa dang / ngo tsha bar ldan pa'i sgra dang / kun spong ba'i sgra dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sgra dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms
kyi sgra dang / chos kun chub pa'i sgra dang / mtho ris su skye ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra dang / theg pa gsum la 'bab pa'i sgra dang / chos chen po'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i sgra
dang | chos chen po'i char rab tu 'bebs pa'i sgra dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgra dang / ngan song gsum las yongs su sgrol ba'i sgra dang / pha rol tu phyin pa
drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i nan tan bya ba'i sgra dang / thabs mkhas pa'i sgra dang / sa bcu 'bab pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rol ba'i sgra dang / bla na med
pa'i theg pa chen po rnam par rol pa'i sgra dang / sa las phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i sgra dang / spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa'i sgra'i nga ro grags par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyis de lta bu'i sprin dang / char rnam pa
sna tshogs mthong zhing de ltar chos kyi sgra'i nga ro'ang thos par gyur nas de dag gi so so'i yid ci la mos pa bzhin du so so'i lus la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bsung dang / me tog dang /
rin po che'i rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dam pas yongs su brgyan par mthong ngo / /yang so so'i lag mthil gnyis na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs shing yid bzhin gyi nor
bu rin po che de dag re re las kyang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab par mthong ngo / /gzhan yang / nor bu rin po che de dag las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs su byung ste/ 'od

zer de dag gi dbang gis sems can de dag so so nas phyogs bcu'i chu klung gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong ngo / /yang 'od zer de dag gi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de re re la'ang 'khor mang po tshad med pas bsti stang dang bcas te yongs su bskor bar mthong ngo / /gzhan yang / 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas
kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang nad kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu nad kyi sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur to/ /gang bsad pa la thug pa dang /
btson du bzung zhing bcings pa dag kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu de dag las yongs su thar bar gyur to/ /gang lus dang / ngag dang / yid mi bde bar spyod pa'i gnas ngan
len lci ba dag kyang 'od de'i dbang gis shin tu yang zhing rnam par dag par gyur to/ /gang bkres shing skom pa dag kyang 'grangs shing ngoms
par gyur to/ /gang gsad pa dang / chad pa sna tshogs kyis nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu sdug bsngal ba dang bral bar gyur to/ /
gang bgo ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / dbyig dang / nor rdzas kyis brel cing phongs pa dag kyang bsams pa bzhin du 'byor cing ldan par gyur to/ /sems can gang srog
gcod pa la dga' zhing mos pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du dga' zhing mos pa dag kyang 'od zer des reg ma thag tu srog gcod pa yongs su spong ba la dga' zhing mos
pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du yongs su spong ba la dga' zhing mos par gyur to/ /sems can gang 'dod pa mi rnyed pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal bar gyur pa
dag kyang 'od zer des reg ma thag tu ji ltar re ba bzhin du rnyed par gyur to/ /gzhan yang / 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems can gang
sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa dag thams cad zhi nas rab tu bde ba dang ldan par mthong ngo / /gzhan yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du 'od kyis snang bar byas pas
sprin dang / rdul dang / na bun dang / rlung dang / rdzi char dang / bkra mi shis pa'i sgra dang / dri mi zhim pa dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba la sogs pa'i ro ngan pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i
reg bya dang / 'jigs skrag pa dang / gnod pa mang po rnams med par gyur to/ /gzhan yang / las ngan pa dang / log pa'i ngag dang / log pa'i bsam pa dang / log par phyogs
pa dang yongs su bral te lhag par mi grang ba dang / lhag par mi tsha ba dang / rab tu zhi zhing bde ba dang / sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang / bde ba'i yo byad dam pa thams
cad kyis yongs su gang bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe na 'khor mang po rnams kyi so so'i lus kyi sa'i khams lhag par lci zhing mi theg pa tsam du gyur to/ /ltas 'di lta bu gyur pa
mthong nas thams cad kyang dngangs te de ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ltas 'di lta bur gyur snyam du rtog pa skyes so/ /de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na brgya byin lha'i dbang
bo dri ma med par skyes zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug pa las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te/ bcom
ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bden par gsung zhing bden gzigs pa/ /bden la rab gnas thub pa
khyod| |'dus pa'i 'khor mang thams cad la/ /mthar phyin bden pa'i chos gsungs shig /so so'i skye bo mang po dag /sdug bsngal rgyu dang sdug
bsngal sel/ /ci yi slad du 'khor 'dir ni/ /sprin dang char rnams gda' bar gyur/ /'khor rnams rab tu dga' rangs nas/ /shin tu dad pa'i bsam pa skyes/ /theg pa
chen por thams cad gzhol/ /yang dag lta skye som nyi brgal/ /'khor mang lha dang mi yi lus/ /lhag par sa yi khams lci bas/ /rang gis mi theg gyur ba 'di/ /ci yi rkyen
gyis ltas 'di byung / /lag mthil gnyis na nor bu'i las/ /rin chen char 'bab 'od kyang 'gyed/ /phyogs bcur snang byas sdig pa bsal/ /sdug bsngal zhi nas bde ba
thob| |'dren pas gsungs shig ci yi rkyen/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ /spos dang phreng ba sna tshogs kyis/ /so so'i lus la brgyan pa gda'/ /lha dang mi kun the tshom skyes//
ci yi rgyu dang ci yi rkyen/ /su zhig gang nas 'dir mchi na/ /rdzu 'phrul mthu 'di ston par gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ /'on te tshangs pa'am bdud lags
sam| |brgya byin lags sam su mchi ba/ /'dren pa chen pos bshad du gsol/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dri ma med par skyes pa la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par byos shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ sngon bskal pa chen po tshad med grangs
med pa'i bar du rnyog pa lnga'i tshe/ sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can yongs su smin par byed pa de/ da ltar 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
khrig stong phrag brgyad cu dang bcas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir nga la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / gzhan yang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la
blta ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba bskyed pa'i phyir 'khor dang bcas te dge sbyong gi gzugs kyis 'dir 'ong bas mngon par shes pa'i mthus cho 'phrul 'di dag bstan to/ /byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po zhes bya ba de tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par gyis yongs su brgyan pas nyan thos dang / rang
sangs rgyas dang / 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyis dpog nus pa med de/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ni yon tan phul du gyur pa thams cad kyi gter du gyur pa'o/ /rnam
par grol ba'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig yongs su dag par byed pa'o/ /mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i ded dpon du gyur pa'o//
yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ltar rin po che thams cad char bzhin du 'bab pas ji ltar re zhing 'dod pa thams cad yongs su tshim par
byed pa'o/ /tshong ba mang po'i rin po che'i gling lta bu'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing skye ba'i phyir zhing gshin pa lta bu'o// rnam par grol ba'i bde ba la 'jog pa'i phyir snod
lta bu'o/ /rin po che dam pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i phyir yon tan gyi bum pa bzang po lta bu'o// dge ba'i nan tan can la snang bar byed pa'i phyir nyi ma gsal ba lta bu'o//
lam stor ba rnams la snang bar byed pa'i phyir sgron ma lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel ba'i phyir zla ba ltar sim pa lta bu'o/ /rkang med pa la theg par gyur pa lta bu'o//
la ma ring por 'gro ba la tshogs kyi stegs bu lta bu'o/ /'brog bslad pa la lam ston pa lta bu'o/ /smyos shing 'khrugs pa la sman dam pa lta bu'o/ /nad kyis gzir ba la
sman pa mkhas pa dang phrad pa lta bu'o/ /rgas shing 'khogs pa la brten dang / 'khar ba lta bu'o/ /ngal ba dang / dub pa la khyi dang / stan lta bu'o/ /chu bo bzhi rgal ba la zam pa lta
bu'o| |pha rol tu 'gro ba la gru dang / gzings lta bu'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa rnam gsum gyi 'bras bu khyad par can smin par byed pa'o/ /dge ba rnam gsum gyi gzhi 'dren cing rgyun
du 'bebs pa'o/ /sbyin pa gtong ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa 'khor lo ltar 'jug pa'o/ /tshul khrims srung ba brtan pas ri rab lhun po lta bu'o/ /brtson 'grus gzhig par dka' ba na rdo rje/
rin po che lta bu'o/ /bzod pa mi g.yo ba ni sa chen po lta bu'o/ /bsam gtan zab pa ni gter gsang ba lta bu'o/ /mnyam par 'jog pas mdzes pa ni me tog gi phreng ba lta bu'o/ /
shes rab zab cing yangs pa ni rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o/ /cis kyang mi chags pa ni nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /'bras bu dam pa'i rgyu dang nye ba ni me tog rgyas pa lta bu'o/ /mu stegs
can 'dul ba la seng ge'i rgyal po lta bu'o/ /lha'i bdud yongs su 'joms pa ni klu'am/ glang po che lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad gcod pa ni lha'i ral gri lta bu'o//
'du 'dzi mang pos skyo ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khru ba ni chu dang pa lta bu'o/ /mi gtsang ba 'i nyal nyil sel ba ni rlung drag po lta bu'o/ /kun
nas nyon mongs pas glags mi gcod pa ni mtshon rnon po lta bu'o/ /'jigs pa dang / bag tsha ba kun las srung ba ni gnyen nam/ mdza' bo lta bu'o/ /phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra
las skyob pa ni 'obs sam/ mkhar lta bu'o/ /nyan nga ba thams cad las grol bar byed pas pha ma lta bu'o/ /zhan cings nyam chung rnams sbed pa ni nags stug po lta bu'o/ /dbyar
lam ring por 'gro ba ba la bsil grib kyi shing chen po lta bu'o/ /tsha ba dang / skom gyis gdungs pa rnams la cha grang lta bu'o/ /bkres pa rnams la
'bras bu zhim po lta bu'o/ /gcer bu rnams la bgo ba'i gos byed pa'o/ /tshe bas nyen pa rnams la sprin stug por gyur pa'o/ /dbul phongs pa la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin
po cher gyur pa'o/ /'jigs skrag pa dag la skyabs dang / gnas su gyur pa'o/ /lo tog rnams la char par gyur ba'o/ /chu rnyog ma can rnams nor bu chu dang du gyur pa'o//
sems can mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'gong bar byed pas spyod yul dam pa ston cing 'khor spro ba dang / tshim par byed pa'o/ /sems can rnams lhag pa'i 'dzam pa dang /
ngo tsha ba la bskul zhing 'dzud pa'o/ /bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs gsog pa la de'i rgyan dang ldan par byed pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa yongs su sel ba la skyug pa
dang / 'khru pa'i sman lta bur gyur pa'o/ /sems 'khrugs pa sdud pa ni mnyam par 'jog pa'i spyod yul lta bur gyur pa'o/ /spobs pa thogs pa med pa ni zo chun rgyud pa'i
'khor lo lta bu'o/ /dmigs pa la sems sdug pa ni gzugs bzang po la rtog pa lta bu'o/ /bzod pa brtan pa ni ri rab lhun po lta bu'o/ /gzugs zab cing rgya che ba ni rgya
mtsho chen po lta bu'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thogs pa med pa ni nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /sgrib pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su sel ba ni ji ltar nyi ma tsha bas 'khyag pa cha mtshon/
bzhu ba lta bu'o/ /rtag tu bas ma gtan dang / gzugs med pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la rol cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rin po che'i dam pa'i gling lta bur gyur
pas ched du ma brtsams kyang chos chen po'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po de ni de lta bu'i yon tan gyi
khyad par tshad med grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa de 'khor dang bcas te gnas 'dir phyir du nya bas 'od las 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul dang / ltas sngar bstan pa yin no/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i yon tan mang po bshad ma thag tu de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po 'khor byang chub sems
dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu dang bcas te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dge sbyong gi gzugs su ston cing lho phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te/ 'khor
mang po dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos gtugs te phyag btsal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas/ 'greng
bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /rnam par 'dren pa rkang gnyis mchog /byams pa'i thugs kyis kun la skyob/ /sa
chen ltar ni shin tu bzod/ /zhe sdang khro ba'i sems kun bsal/ /mtshan dang dpe byad mchog ldan pas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing rab brgyan/ /bden pa'i byams dang snying rje
yis| |rgyal ba'i zhing kun rab tu 'gengs/ /sred pa'i dra ba kun bcad nas/ /yang dag ci bzhin bde bar gnas/ /yongs su dag pa'i zhing spangs nas/ /rnyog pa can gyi sems
can dgrol// rnyog pa'i zhing 'dir dam bcas te/ /ngan 'gro sems can smin par mdzad/ /yang dag brtan pa'i rtsol ba yis/ /ring mo zhig nas dka' thub spyad/ /yun ring
dka' thub spyad pa dang / /thos nas 'jigs pa'i sems kyang skye/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab bskyed/ /sangs rgyas byang chub
sems dpa' dang / tshad med nyan thos bsnyen bkur mchod/ /gzhan yang skye bo mang po dag /bkres sko ma na 'chi kun las bsgral// so so'i skye bo gzhan gyi phyir/ /lus
srog ma chags mang du btang / /yang dag dam pa'i chos tshol phyir/ /sha dang rus pa'ang mang du btang / /bdag gi bde ba kun btang nas/ /skye bo rnams la thugs brtser
dgongs/ /so so'i skye bo mang po'i phyir/ /the tshom dra ba gcod la brtson/ /dbang po drug rnams rab bsdams nas/ /'dong ba thams cad ring du spangs/ /'dus byas mi rtag sdug
bsngal te/ /bdag med stong pa nyid du rtogs/ /sdug bsngal las kun skye ba yi/ /rgyu ni 'dod chags sred pa'o/ /de phyir dbang po drug pas sngar/ /'dod chags yongs su gcad
par bya/ /sems can gnas pa'i khams kun tu/ /rtag par thugs rje chen pos gnas/ /byang chub mchog tu sangs rgyas kyang / /sngon gyi smon lam kun mi gtong / /sems
can gang zhig sdug bsngal gyis/ /rnam par gzir ba dag gzigs nas/ /shin tu 'bab pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /de las sgrol phyir rab tu brtson/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims
bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan shes rab kun bsgoms nas/ /ji ltar ma ni bu gcig la/ /byams pa'i sems kyi gso bzhin du/ /sngon yang sems can ris kun la/ /
rtag tu byams pa'i thugs bskyed pas/ /de phyir myur du sangs rgyas nas/ /tshad med pa yi 'khor rnams sgrol// ji tsam byang chub spyod bsgoms pa/ /sems can don du ma bsngos
med| |de bas sems can thams cad la/ /pha rol phyin pa drug mi gtong / /rtag tu dus ngan tha ma'i tshe/ /bla med byang chub bsgrubs pas na/ /da yang dus ngan tha ma'i tshe/ /bla med
byang chub mngon sangs rgyas/ /ngan par lta ba'i lta klu mi/ /gnod sbyin dag ni kun btul te/ /the tshom gcod cing bder bkod pa/ rdo rje lta bu'i lam
la'o/ /tshad med pa yi skye bo dag /byang chub mchog tu lung yang ston/ /mchod 'os 'dren pa'i gtsor gyur te/ /mchog gi bsod nams zhing du gyur/ /dpe zla med pa'i bcom
ldan 'das/ /byams pas 'gro ba kun la skyob/ /tshad med grags pa chen po yis/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten yongs su khyab/ /de bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /bdag
gi don du bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /kun nas lhan cig 'dir 'dus nas/ /thub pa chen po spyan sngar lhags/ /dam pa'i chos rnams thos nas ni/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te//
lhag par yang dag brtson bskyed nas/ /byang chub spyod la nan tan bgyid/ /rnam par 'dren pa'i chos kyi mthus/ /thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bas/ /de bas deng 'dir
'dren khyod kyis/ /bsdus pa'i 'khor ni sngon ma byung / /gnod sbyin khri phrag bcu gsum snyed/ /rtag tu sha za khrag 'thung ba/ /thams cad sdig pa'i las btang nas/ /byang chub
chen por 'bab cing gzhol/ /kha cig khyad par gzugs mchog dang / /bzod pa ting nge 'dzin yang thob/ /kha cig zag pa kun zad nas/ /'jig rten mchog gi dgra bcom
gyur| |kha cig tshad med bzhi bsgoms shing / /kha cig bsdu ba bzhi la gnas/ /kha cig yang dag rigs bzhi thob/ /kha cig mthun pa'i bzod la gnas/ /kha cig dpa' 'grol
ting 'dzin thob/ /kha cig shes rab mig dang ldan/ /kha cig mi skye bzod la gnas/ /de kun 'dren pas byin gyis brlabs/ /bcom ldan gzi brjid chen po'i mthus/ /bdud kyi
'khor rnams bcom nas su/ /rnam pa dgu bcu rtsa lnga yi/ /mu stegs can gyi ris kun btul/ /sems can dmyal ba byol song dang / /yi dwags lha min rgyud kun bcom/ /bde
bas sems can bden pa rnams/ /thams cad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar lhags/ /nad dang mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang / /mu ges 'jigs pa'ang deng 'dir bcil/ /sems can mdongs
shing 'thom pa dang / /yang dag lam ni stor ba bsgrol/ /nyon mongs myos shing 'khrugs pa dag /thams cad zhi ba'i lam la bkod/ /bdag gi bya ba kun spangs te/ /lhags nas
bcom ldan zhabs la thug /dpag tu med pa'i zhing rnams na/ /bcom ldan da ltar bzhugs pa'i rnams/ /thams cad khyod la kun bsngags bas/ /thos nas thams cad 'di
ru lugs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa rgya mtsho yi/ /yang dag yon tan tshad ma mchis/ /sems can mang po'i don mdzad pa/ /mos pa'i sems kyis phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshad med bsod
nams rdzogs bgyis pas/ /bcom ldan zhabs la phyag 'tshal gyur/ /tshad med bskal pa'i bar du yang / /mchod pa mang pos mchod par shog /bdag
kyang bcom ldan ji bzhin du/ /de lta bu yi yi dam bcas/ /rnyog pa can gyi 'jig rten 'dir/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po sa'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa dam pa 'di dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas 'khor dang bcas te/ gzhan yang / lha rdzas kyi bsung dang / me tog
rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i rgyan tshad med pa snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs su gyur te/ dam pa'i chos
mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ci'ang mi smra bar 'dug go /de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po sa'i snying po mthong nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ so so nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha rdzas kyi spos dang / me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / /na bza' dang /
rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs la sogs pa phul te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /
bdag cag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mngon sum du skyes bu chen po khyod mthong nas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas par gyur to/
zhes smra'o/ /de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs par the tshom 'dri zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa stan las langs nas gos
tshags bcos te phrag pa g.yas pa phyung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na
ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu 'di gang nas mchis/ gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na/ ji
srid cig na mchis/ yon tan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam zhig dang ldan na bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsngags la phyir yang bcom ldan 'das kyi yon
tan gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyi khyab pa la mngon par bstod par gyur/ bdag cag gis sngon ma mthong bas ngo mtshar du'i gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bshad du gsol/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ thongs shig /skyes bu chen po 'di'i yon tan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam pa de 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang / mi'i 'khor thams cad
kyis rtogs par nus pa ma yin no/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par bshad na 'jig
rten du bcas pa lha dang / mi thams cad kyi mgo rmongs te yid mi ches par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rigs par the tshom 'dri bas yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas
khyod la phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o/ /ji ltar skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan gyi khyad par tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ /'di lta ste/ dpa' bar 'gro
ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyi khyad par la bde bar gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul lnga shin tu rtogs par 'jug pa'o/ /mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i khyad par yang
thob pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang du gyur pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sa la bzod pa thob pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i
pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /seng ge rab tu bsgyings pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ting 'dzin la'ang shin tu gnas pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi ri la'ang rab tu 'dzegs pa'o/ /mu
stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshoms pa ste/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa thams cad du de gnas par
byed do/ /skyes bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du gnas te/ gang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par skyed par
gyur pas gdul ba'i sems can tshad med pa dag yongs su smin par byed do/ /skyes bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/
gal te ye shes mngon par skyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad mthun
par ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi spyod yul kun mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te dpag tu med pa'i
ye shes dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad ci nus pa bzhin du
tshad med pa'i yo byad dam pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de
bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te rnam par dag pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i
mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyis mthun par 'dod pa'i spyod yul gyi nyes pa'i skyon tshad med pa mthong nas sems rnam par
dag par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te khrel ba dang / ngo cha ba dang ldan pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad lhag pa'i 'dzem pa dang / ngo tsha ba dang ldan
zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos dang yongs su bral nas bsam pa mi nyams par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur
te| gal te theg pa thams cad dang ldan pa bsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad
thangs mkhas pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mig gi mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba mngon par shes pa dang /
'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyi rgyu dang / 'bras bu mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur
te| |gal te mya ngan med pa'i mngon par shes pas rig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i
sems can thams cad mya ngan dang / yi mug pa dang / rmugs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du
'gyur te/ gal te mngon par shes pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams
cad thabs mkhas pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rten
kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mun pa dang bral te/ sangs rgyas kyi
zhing de na gnas pa thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de
bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi
zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad log par lta ba yongs su spangs nas/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa
bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing

de dag gi ri khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / ri rab lhun po dang / de ma yin pa'i ri gzhan dang / lung pa dang / lung phran dang / gcong rong dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / tsher ma dang / rtswa
dang / shing ngan pa thams cad mi snang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ji tsam du ngan par gdags pa dug dang / byad stems dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / ye 'brog dang / glo bur
dang / rims nad dang / yul ngan pa dang / nam rmus pa dang / rdul dang / dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba'i nyal nyil thams cad kyang zhi zhing med par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi
zhing de'i sa gzhi'ang lag mthil bzhin du mnyam zhing bkra shis pa rnam pa sna tshogs rang 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / phul du 'gyur ba dang / dam
par 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma bzang po du mas yongs su brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te ye shes
kyi stobs gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i bdud kyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas te
thams cad 'jigs skrag nas/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te
glog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad 'jig rten pha rol
gyi 'jigs pa dang bral zhing chos kyis spro bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te mchog dam pa'i ro dang
ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bsams pa bzhin du zas dang / skom
gyis tshim par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te mchog gi mdangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad gang yang lhag pa'i mthu stobs
dang mi ldan pa med de/ nad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te
mchog dam pa'i yo byad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad ci
la mos pa bzhin du khri stan dang / gding ba dang / gos dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / ci tsam du 'tsho ba'i yo byad du gtogs pa de dag thams cad kyis brel zhing phongs
pa med de rab tu mdzes pa shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te
rtsod pa med pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad
lus dang / sems zo mdog bde zhing yang ba dang / dgra sdang ba dang / 'ching ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / 'dum zhing dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul
khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sems mi 'khrug pa dang / shes rab yongs su rdzogs pa la dga' zhing mos par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du
sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te phul du gyur pa'i spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad khyad par can gyi rab tu dga' ba tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du
'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi 'od ces phya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams
cad thogs pa med pa'i ye shes thob cing rnam par dag pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur
te/ gal te rgyal ba'i rdo rje la shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams
cad dbang po kun dang ldan zhing dbang po mi nyams pa dang / rtag tu yang dag par 'byung ba'i lam la mos shing sems rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du
sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te lhag pa'i rgyal mtshan rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting
nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bdag sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos la shin tu skyo zhing mi 'dod pa dang / thams cad kyang
dge ba srung ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal
te byams pa dang / snying rjer ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad
byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / gnod pa'am/ 'tshe ba med pa'i sems dang / kun la snyoms pa'i sems dang / gcig la gcig phan pa dang / bde bar byed
pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te bsod nams thams cad shin tu sdud pa zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / nad dang / mu ge dang yongs su bral te/ dus
ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char pa dang / kha ba dang / rtsub pa dang / tsha ba dang / sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa'i reg bya'i yul yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad yongs su zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de
ltar skyes bu chen po de gal te rgya mtsho glog 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sa chen po thams cad rin po
che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas par 'gyur zhing nyes pa'i skyon thams cad dang yongs su bral te rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i shing dang / gos kyi shing dang / snod kyi shing dang /
rgyan gyi shing dang / me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / rol mo sna tshogs kyi shing la sogs pa 'tsho ba'i yo byad dam pa tshad med pa snyed kyis yongs su brgyan par gyur to//
de bzhin du/ mdor na/ rigs kyi bu de ni sems can mang po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyin re zhing snga dro'i dus su ting nge 'dzin gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par 'jug ste/ ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun na gdul ba'i sems can thams cad la ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du phan pa dang / bde
ba'i don de dang / de dag gis yongs su smin par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni sngon bskal pa chen po tshad med dpag tu med pa'i bar du rnyog ba lnga'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs
pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus su 'jig rten gyi khams la lar gal te mtshon gyis
'jigs pa byung ste/ sems can dag yongs su gdungs par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'di de lta bu dag mthong nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mthus mtshon gyis 'jigs
pa de dag yongs su bcil nas sems can rnams gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems kyis snying brtse bar byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams la lar nad kyis 'jigs pa byung ste/
sems can kha btag pa na rigs kyi bu 'dis de lta bu dag mthong nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mthus nad kyis 'jigs pa yongs su bcil nas sems can
rnams rab tu bde ba thob par byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams la lar gal te mu ges 'jigs pa byung ste sems can/ kha btag pa na rigs kyi bu 'dis de lta bu dag mthong nas
snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus mu ges 'jigs pa yongs su bcil te sems can rnams kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'dis de ltar ting
nge 'dzin mang po'i shugs kyis de lta bu la sogs pa tshad med dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyis sems can gyi dbugs 'byin to/ /rigs
kyi bu 'di de ltar nan tan gyi khyad par tshad med grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar byed pa'i don la rab tu
brtson pa'o/ /sngon 'das pa'i dus na skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
snyed las zad mi shes pa'i yid ma chen po bcas te snying rje chen po dang / mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus chen po rab tu bskyed do/ /de ltar snying rje chen po dang / mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson
'grus bskyed de zad mi shes pa'i yi dam bcas pas gong nas gong du 'phags pa'i shugs kyis nyin zhag gcig gam/ skad cig thang cig tsam gyis kyang so so'i skye bo tshad med
pa bye ba khrag khrig btul te/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs las bsgral nas thams cad ci dang / ci 'dod pa de dang / de dag gis re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /gnas gang dag na
sems can gang 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal te/ 'dod pas yongs su gdungs par gyur pa dag sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing / dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na ci dang / ci 'dod pa thams cad 'thob cing sdug bsngal dang bral te/ skal pa ji lta
ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gang dag na sems can gang bza' ba dang / btung
bas phongs par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te
mchod pa byas na ci dang / ci 'dod pa thams cad 'thob cing bza' ba dang / btung ba dang ldan te mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /
gnas gang dag na sems can gang bgo ba'am/ rin po che'i rgyan nam/ nad kyi rkyen sman nam/ gding ba'am/ khri stan nam/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis brel cing phongs par gyur pa dag gis
sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas mchod pa byas na ci dang / ci 'dod pa rnyed
cing bgo ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / gding ba dang / khri dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad 'byor cing skal pa ji lta ba bzhin mtho ris kyi lhar skye
ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag byams sdug pa dang bral te/ dgra sdang bar gyur pa dang phrad par gyur pa
