rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge
'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang /
smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan dag thob pa'ang ji skad bstan pa bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho'i bar du log par lta ba yongs su spangs na sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang / sems rnam par dag
cing log par rtog pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor
ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba'ang log par ltung ba'i dbang gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'jug cing mthong ba dang
thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / yang dag par lta ba la sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur
to| |'di ltar log par lta ba yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi len te/ lus 'di nyid la'ang lha
dang / mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang / dogs pa med par 'gyur ba dang / lus dang / sems rab tu bde ba dang / sems rnam par dag cing log par lta ba
dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na'ang lus dang / sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang / chung ma dang / 'khor thams cad kyis
yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos
kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang / yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ lus dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / bkur
sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye zhing dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du
skyes par sems rnam par dag cing log par lta ba dang bral ba dang / byad gzugs bzang pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang / phyir yang yid
du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ de'i rjes su mthun par slob pa
dang | log par lta ba'i chos yongs su spong ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs
pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa thams cad rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i
ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang /
lha'i bdud kyi 'khor thams cad dang bral ba dang / mu stegs can gyi 'khor thams cad dang bral ba dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing shin tu mdzes pa dang / yang dag par
lta ba dang ldan zhing ngo mtshar dang / bkra shis dang / tshul ngan pa'i lta ba sna tshogs dang / rtag par lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / bdag dang / bdag gir lta ba thams cad mongs
su spangs pa'i sems can dag zhing der skye ste/ shin tu tshe ring ba dang / theg pa chen po'i ro gcig la longs spyod par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang
dpag tu med de/ sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du chos ston pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing / sems can tshad
med pa la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du ro gcig pa'i chos bstan pa la rtsod pa med pas yongs su rgyas par byed cing bgegs dang / bar chad med par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu /
'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po log par lta ba yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo bcu pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo rnam pa
bcu po 'di dang ldan pas nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul ba med par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/
theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i
nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa la'ang rung / chung du na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing skra dang / kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ba dang / theg
pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing rjes su slob pa dang / rtag
tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba
dang | dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub
kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan 'thob pa'ang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po de dag dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snga ma 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mi dge ba bcu'i las yongs su
spongs nas thams cad kyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi 'bras bu bsngags shing bstod de/ sems can thams cad la bde ba dang / phan pa'i don dang / byang chub kyi lam skye
zhing 'phel bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi las dang / nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal lhag ma ma lus par bsal bar bya ba dang / ngan song gsum bskam par bya ba dang / dkon
mchog gsum gyi gdung bas ba par bya ba dang / khams gsum gyi srid pa yongs su gcad par bya ba dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gcad par bya ba dang /
thams cad myur du 'jigs pa med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer du gzung ba'i phyir ji skad bshad pa bzhin du mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi 'bras bu yongs su spong ngo //
de bas na/ rigs kyi bu/ gal te yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di ma bsgrubs par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'am/ chung
du na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'ga' tsam yang mi srung bar nga ni theg pa chen po yang dag par spyod pa'o zhe'am/ nga ni bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'o zhes zer na/ gang zag de ni shin tu brdzun par smra ba ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'jig rten slu ba dang /
'dzem pa dang / ngo tsha ba med pa'ang stong par smra zhing chad par lta ba/ glen pa mi shes pa slu ba can yin te/ de tshe 'phos nas ngan song du ltung bar shes par bya'o/ /rigs kyi
bu| gang tshig tu brjod pa tsam mam/ mnyan pa tsam gyis chog ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsgoms pa'am/ nan tan bya mi dgos par byang chub dang / mya ngan las 'das
par thob du zin na ni bskal pa gcig la yud tsam thang cig gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sa'i khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can thams cad
byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/ mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba zhig na de ni de lta bu'i gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni theg pa chen po'i rtsa
ba yin te/ byang chub kyi rgyu dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i them skas lta bu'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te sems skyed pa tsam mam/ smon lam btab pa tsam gyis chog ste/ dge ba bcu'i las
kyi lam goms par nan tan bya mi dgos par byang chub dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar thob tu zin na ni bskal pa gcig la yud tsam thang cig gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
kyi zhing thams cad sa'i khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba zhig na de ni de lta
bu'i gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu'i khyad par dang / yon tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /rigs
kyi bu| gal te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan du ma byas na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi bskal par bdag ni theg pa chen po pa'o zhes
zer te/ 'chad dam/ nyan tam/ sems bskyed dam/ smon lam btab kyang byang chub dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba 'thob par mi 'gyur la/ gzhan yang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
las 'don mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan byas pas 'jig rten na rgyal rigs dang / bram ze la sogs pa rigs chen po dang / rgyal chen ris
bzhi'i lha nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched steng gi bar du yod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du'ang yod par 'gyur te/ de dag kun kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la shin tu nan tan byed pa'i khyad par dang / bye brag
las gyur to/ /de bas na/ rigs kyi bu/ gang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan
te| mi dge ba bcu'i sdom pa la mi gnas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gang myur du theg pa chen po'i spyod yul du chud par 'dod
dam| myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod dam/ myur du dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'dod na sngar dge ba bcu'i las
kyi lam shin tu bsrung bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang / yon tan rnam par gzhag pa'i gzhi dang / 'jig rten
dang / 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu'i mchog thob par byed pa'i rgyu yin no/ /de bas na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la shin tu nan tan bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal kun gcod cing / byang chub chen po 'thob 'dod pa/ /dge bcu'i 'khor lo'i nan
tan la/ /le lo ma byed brtson par gyis/ /theg pa gsum gyis dam chos dang / /theg pa rnam gsum gang zag dang / /rab tu byung ba thams cad la/ /'khrul pa med par 'thob par
'gyur/ /theg chen spyod la dad mos shing / /thams cad 'khor gyi dbugs 'byin pa'i/ /chos mchog rtogs nas zhing dag der/ /byang chub chen po myur du 'thob/ /gal te srog
gcod yongs spangs na/ /kun gyis bkur zhing bla mar byed/ /rtag tu nad med tshe yang ring / /bde zhing skyid la gnod pa med/ /skye ba'i gnas ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas spyod
yul lam la mos/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong / /myur du bla med byang chub 'thob/ /ma byin len pa yongs spangs na/ /mkhas pas bkur zhing bla mar byed/ /'dod chags
skye ba'i lam kun zhi/ /'dod chags med pa skye bar 'gyur/ /skye ba kun tu longs spyod ldan/ /sbyin bdag chen por de 'gyur te/ /rin chen mang pos brgyan pa dang / /yid 'ong sangs
rgyas zhing yang 'theb/ /'dod pas log g.yem yongs spangs na/ /nyon mongs dri ma zhi bar 'gyur/ /'dod chags srid pa'i mtsho yang skems/ /rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing myur
'thob/ /sems can rnam pa mang po yang / /'dod pa'i 'dam las 'byin par 'gyur/ /theg chen la ni rab bkod nas/ /tshangs pa'i spyad la spyod du
btsud/ /brdzun du smra ba yongs spangs na/ /'phags pa'i dbang dang ye shes 'thob/ /rtag tu bden pa smra bar dga'/ /brdzun du 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal 'jil/ /tshig gcig
tshad mar btsugs pas na/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong / /rdzun mi smra ba bsgoms pas na/ /byang chub chen po myur du 'thob/ /phra ma'i tshig smra yongs spangs na/ /dge
ba'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong / /chad par lta bar yod mi 'gyur/ /'phags pa'i chags med dga' ba dang / /rin chen gter gyi gzungs
'thob cing / /zab mo chos kyi rgya mtshor rig /myur du bla med byang chub 'thob/ /gal te zhe gcod tshig spangs te/ /'jam zhing mnyen pa'i tshig smras na/ /sems can kun gyis
bkur bar 'gyur/ /snga ma'i mi dge las kyang zhi/ /'khor rnams rtag tu dga' ba dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i ston par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mang po'i spyod yul shes/ /sa bcu
las kyang 'da' bar 'gyur/ /kyal bar smra ba yongs spangs na/ /mkhas pas bkur zhing bla mar byed/ /gzhan la tshig tu smra ba kun/ /yon tan rnam lnga 'thob par 'gyur/ /
rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshig nyan cing / /'phags pa'i lam tshol spro bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs rdzogs shing / /thams cad mkhyen pa myur du 'thob/ /gal te chags sems
yongs spangs te/ /'phags pa rnams la mi smod cing / /dur smrig gyon la mchod par byed/ /theg pa gsum gyi byang chub sgrub/ /rtag tu rnam dag zhing du skye/ /ston pa'i gnas su gnas
par 'gyur/ /bla med theg pa la zhon te/ /rgyal ba'i ye shes myur du 'thob/ /gal te gnod sems yongs spangs te/ /gcig tu byams pa'i sems bsgoms na/ /mnyam par bzhag
pa'ang myur du 'thob/ /'phags pa'i spyod yul med par 'gyur/ /rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing du skye/ /nyes pa'i skyon rnams kun dang bral/ /de la gnas na byang chub 'thob/ /gnod
sems thams cad spang bar bya/ /ngan par lta ba yongs spangs te/ /rnam dag dad pa'i sems bsgoms na/ /theg gsum ston la mos byed cing / /sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa
byed| |ngan song gsum las yongs thar te/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams dang phrad/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan/ /ye shes mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ /dge
ba bcu yi las lam gyis/ /byang chub mchog thob 'gyur zhes gsungs/ /snyoms par 'jug dang gzungs rnams dang / /sa dang bzod pa skye bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid che ba'i
'khor lo 'dis/ /ngan song thams cad rab bcom nas/ /sdig pa'i sgrib pa kun kyang choms/ /myur du byang chub chen po thob/ /'phags pa shin
tu rgyas pa chen po sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pa de go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo
de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur
ro| |bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / bal glang dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / lus kyi yan lag dang /
rkang pa dang / lag pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / mgo dang / mig dang / rkang dang / klad rgyas dang / pags pa dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag dang / yul dang / srid dang /
bu dang | chung ma dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / khang khyim dang / zhing 'brog la sogs pa de dag thams cad sbyin pa de re re byed pa na lus dang / srog la mi lta zhing bdag gcig pu 'jig
rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir sems bskyed de sbyin pa byed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i myu gu bskyed pa'i
phyir sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed do/ /thabs mkhas pa dang / shes rab mchog bskyed pa'i phyir sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed do/ /sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po phan pa
dang | bde ba'i don gyi phyir sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed do/ /sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir sdig pa byin pa'i sems bskyed do/ /gzhan las spag go snyam pa
med pa'i sems dang / brlang ba med pa'i sems dang / phrag dog med pa'i sems dang / ser sna dang / zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa byin no/ /gang sbyin pa'i
dngos po che'ang rung / chung yang rung / chung du na zan changs gcig tsam gyi sbyin pa byas na'ang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed do/ /nyan thos kyi
theg pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed do/ /gang sbyin pa'i dngos po de
che'ang rung / chung yang rung / chung du na zan changs gcig tsam gyi sbyin pa byas na'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngo zhing sbyin pa byin pa'i
sems bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed
pa na 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
bsod nams chen po'i zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed pa ni byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i sems med kyi/ bdag gi dbul ba de spong ba
dang | bdag sdug bsngal las thar ba dang / bdag bde ba thob par bya ba dang / bdag mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa byed de/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir
sbyin pa byed pa ni ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa byin na ni byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi dbul phongs
pa spong ba dang / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir
sbyin pa byed kyi/ bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir sbyin pa spyod pa ma yin no/ /de lta bas na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed cing yongs su srung
bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zang zing gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par spyod pa na 'dod pa rnam lnga'i mchog la sems mi chags te/ bdag nyid
dbang ba bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sems can kun la sbyin pa byed de/ sems can thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i sems dang / bdag gi sdug bsngal thams cad la ji mi snyam
pa'i bzod pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la bde ba sbyin pa'i sems dang / sems can thams
cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i sems la gnas te sbyin pa byed do/ /de bas na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur
dang / srung ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te 'dod pa lnga la sems mi chags shing byams pa dang / snying rje chen pos sbyin pa byed na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes bya'o/ /gal te 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa rnam lnga'ang ma spangs la byams pa dang /
snying rje chen po'ang med par sbyin pa byed na sbyin pa'i dngos po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa btang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/ nyan
thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa'ang ma yin pas sbyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ma yin no/ /de bas na 'jig rten gyi
'dod pa lnga spangs te/ byams pa dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sbyin pa bya'o/ /gal te 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa lnga'ang ma spangs la byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'ang med
par sbyin pa byed na byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang mi bya la/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa'ang ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'dod pa rnam pa lnga la chags pas sbyin pa byed
na bdag nyid kyi lus kyi sdug bsngal gyi cha cung zad kyang zhi bar mi 'gyur na sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal tshad med pa bsal ba lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ zang zing sbyin pa'i 'khor lo ldan pa/ /mkhas pa bsam pa dag pa'i mos pas/ /'dod pa rnam lnga dag
ni spangs te/ /sems can kun la phan dang bde byed/ /sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir gyi/ /rnam smin 'bras bu re phyir ma yin/ /sbyin pa'i dngos po byin pa chung yang / /yang dag
bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur/ /sbyin pa'i dngos po mang du byas kyang / /'dod pa rnam lnga dag la gnas na/ /'phags pa dag gi phyag rgyas ma btab/ /ma nges pa yi tshogs la
gnas 'gyur/ /sbyin pa'i dngos po byin pa chung yang / /'dod pa'i lnga la mi gnas pa ni/ /nyan thos dag dang rang rgyal ba yi/ /yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur/ /de
bas 'dod pa rnam lnga spangs la/ /rtag tu rnam dag sbyin pa byed cing / /sems can kun la bde ba byas na/ /yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo de dang
ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir myur du nyi ma'i sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing nyan
thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams chen po'i zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos
dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams kyis bstan pa dam pa'i chos nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / theg pa chen po
dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / 'jig rten gyi chos dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos dang / zag pa zad pa'i chos dang / 'dus
byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos dang / gnyis su med pa'i chos rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rnam pa bcu po 'di la dad cing gus
par byed pa dang / ji skad thos pa rnams ci nus su gzungs su 'dzin cing yid la byed do/ /rab tu rtog go /mthar khong du chud par byed cing gzhan dag la'ang ci rigs par ston
par byed do/ /nam chos ston pa'i tshe na phrag dog med pa'i sems dang / ser sna med pa'i sems dang / nga rgyal med pa'i sems dang / rnyed pa mi re ba'i sems dang / gzhan mi
smod pa'i sems dang / bdag mi bstod pa'i sems dang / bsti stang dang bcas pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / byams pa chen po'i sems dang / snying rje chen po'i sems
su bya'o| |nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag la ni nyan thos kyi chos ston cing 'chad kyi/ de la rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / rang sangs
rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos ston gyi/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos sam/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / theg pa chen po'i gang zag
la ni theg pa chen po'i chos ston gyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po dang / snod ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston
gyi| dbang po dang snod du ma gyur pa la chos mi ston to/ /gang theg pa chen po'i sems can la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa spyod cig bar ram/ nyan thos kyi theg pa spyod cig par mi skul
lo| |rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi sems can la skabs kha cig tu theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la nan tan byos shig ces skul ba'i skabs ni yod de/ nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi
sems can la skabs kha cig tu rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i spyod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la nan tan gyis shig ces skul ba'i skabs kyang yod
de| de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i dam pa'i chos chung du na tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshigs su bcad pa phyed tsam la'ang shin tu dad cing bkur sti byed kyi/ de la
'phya'am/ skur ba'am/ bgegs sam/ bar chad mi byed de/ chos ston pa la sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar 'du shes pa dang / chos nyan pa'i 'khor rnams la nad pa dang 'dra bar
'du shes pa dang / gang 'chad pa'i chos la sman bzang po dang 'dra bar 'du shes shing 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bcad de re ba med pas dam pa'i chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/
'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
'khor lo de dang ldan na 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ myur du nyi ma'i sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu
'das pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod
pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ mkhas pa chos
kyi sbyin pa spyod pa dag /snod bzhin theg pa gsum gyi chos ston to/ /theg pa gzhan dag de la ston mi byed/ /thos nas de la 'phya zhing skur mi 'gyur/ /dbang po snod bzhin dam pa'i chos
ston gyi/ /dbang po snod min dag la ma yin no/ /so sor ji ltar ci la mos pa bzhin/ /de dang de yi chos ston mgu bar byed/ /theg pa chen po spyod pa'i gang zag la/ /theg pa rnam pa gnyis
kyi chos mi bstan/ /bar bar theg pa gnyis kyi gang zag la/ /theg pa 'bring dang rab kyi chos ston to/ /shin tu dad cing gus pas chos mnyan gyi/ /de la 'phya zhing skur bar mi bya'o/ /
chos smra ba la mchod pa byed pa ni/ /sangs rgyas 'dra bar de la 'du shes bskyed/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa yi nad bsal phyir/ /dam pa'i chos kyi sman dag nyan par bskul/ /khe dang
grags pa shin tu ring spangs te/ /dam pa'i chos dag bstan cing bshad par bya/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims rnam par
dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/
nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por
'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur/ de la ji ltar na tshul khrims
rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ thun mong ba dang / thun mong ba ma
yin pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo thun mong pa zhe na/ gang khyim na gnas pa dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma'i tshul
khrims kyi sdom pa blangs pa'am/ yang na rab tu byung ba so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa ste/ sdom pa 'di dang / so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims 'di ni byang chub
sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo thun mong ba ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims
kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa 'di'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa chod par ram/ log par lta ba sil bar ram/ las kyi sgrib pa dang / 'khor ba
las grol bar mi 'gyur te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes kyang mi bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo thun mong ma yin pa zhe na/ gang byang chub
sems dpa' rnams phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dang / gnod pa med pa'i sems dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis rnam par dag
pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo / /tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims ngan pa can dang / sbyin pa dang / ser sna dang / byams pa dang / zhe sdang dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo can rab 'bring
tha ma kun la bye brag mi 'byed pa'i sems dang / khyad par med pa'i 'du shes kyis tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo / /khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la zhe sdang med pa
dang | khong khro ba med pa dang / ngan par spyod pa med pas tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo / /srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rnam par rtog pa med pas
tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo / /'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo / /gzugs yod pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo / /gzugs med
pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo / gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo / /srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i
'bras bu thams cad la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo / /rnyed pa dang / mi rnyed pa la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo / /'du byed rnams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung
ste| 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por
'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyim na gnas shing sdom pa len pa/ /rang byung so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims/ /theg pa gnyis
dang thun mong yin te/ /byang chub chen po zhes ni mi bya/ /mkhas pa stong pa nyid chos sgom pa/ /'jig rten kun la mi rten mi gnas/ /srid pa kun la gnas ma yin par/ /rnam par dag
pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo / /mtshan ma spong ba'i tshul khrims dag ni/ /chags pa med de zag pa kun med/ /tshul khrims 'di lnga srung ba dag ni/ /yang dag bsod nams zhing zhes de bya//
rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa| nyan thos dang / rang sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed
par 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar na bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa la mtshan nyid rnam pa gnyis te/ gang zhe na 'jig
rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bzod pa zhe na/ de ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa ste/ sems can la dmigs
pa/ len pa dang bcas pa/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la rten pa/ bsod nams kyi las la brten te bzod par byed pa'o/ /gzhan
yang / bdag gi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya la brten nas bzod par byed pa'o/ 'jug pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa ji snyam pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / mthu
zhan pa'i bzod pa'i sems can gtong ba'i bzod pa dang / g.yo dang / sgyur bcas pa'i bzod pa dang / pha rol la 'drid pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i
don mi byed pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi bzod pa zhes bya ste/ bzod pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dang thun mong ma
yin gyi/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ma yin te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod
nams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes kyang mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzod pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ zag pa med pa'i
bzod pa ste/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi chos chen po'i 'od kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir chags pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / bya ba'i dngos po
thams cad dang / tshig tu smra ba dang / rgyu dang / mtshan ma dang / yi ge dang / sgra skad thams cad yongs su bcad pa'i skye mched la brten pa'i bzod pa spyod do/ /bzod pa 'di bsgoms
pas kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum dang / bskal pa rnam gsum dang / mtshan nyid gsum dang / dus gsum dang / srid pa gsum dang / 'du byed rnam gsum dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa
ba gsum dang / chu bo bzhi dang / mdud pa rnam bzhi dang / nye bar len pa bzhi dang / lus kyi mdud pa rnam bzhi la sogs pa yongs su bcad pas bzod pa 'di bsgom pa'i tshe sems
dang | yid rab tu zhi bas 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa de dang ldan pas thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga rnams yongs su bsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen
por 'gyur ba/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bzod pa la ni rnam pa gnyis te/ /mtshan mar bcas dang mtshan
ma med pa/ /mtshan mar bcas pa'i bzod pa chags yod/ /mkhas pa dag ni de la mi bstod/ /'du byed rnam gsum phung po khams dang / /skye mched la rten bzod pa sgom pa/
de ni zag bcas bzod pa yin te/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma yin/ /phyin ci log ni rnam bzhi bsal nas/ /chags pa med pa'i bzod pa sgom zhing / /'du byed rnam
pa gsum dag zhe na/ /bzod pa 'di la thams cad bstod 'gyur/ /'du byed thams cad rab tu zhi zhing / /rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs te/ /sems ni nam mkha' 'dra
bar mnyam pa/ /bzod pa 'di la thams cad bstod 'gyur/ /thams cad chos la ro gcig mthun par/ /stong pa mtshan ma med pa zhi ba/ /sems ni ci la'ang mi gnas mi
chags/ /bzod pa 'di ni phan don cher 'gyur/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
dpa'i brtson 'grus la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus she na/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus gyis 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsum la nan tan byed do/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa
byed pa'i bsod nams kyi las dang / tshul khrims srung ba'i bsod nams byed pa'i las dang / bsgom pa'i bsod nams byed pa'i las so/ /las 'di dag byed pa ni brtson 'grus
rnam pa gsum zhes bya ste/ brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum po 'di dag ni sems can la dmigs pa zag pa dang bcas pa/ nye bar len pa dang bcas pa/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu
bstan pa/ bsod nams kyi las la brten pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi brtson 'grus zhes bya'o/ /brtson 'grus 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
la sogs pa dang thun mong yin te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos
dang | rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa'ang ma yin no/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha
chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' dag shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis nyon mongs pa'i las dang
sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba ste/ brtson 'grus 'di ni 'phags pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ zag pa med pa/ nye bar len pa med pa/ rten dang / gnas med de/ brtson
'grus dang / le lo dang / sbyin pa dang / ser sna dang / tshul khrims dang / ngan pa'i tshul khrims can dang / byams pa dang / zhe sdang dang / sems can rab dang / 'bring dang / tha
ma kun la mi 'byed pa'i sems dang / bye brag med pa'i 'du shes kyis shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid
dang | dmigs pa med pas bya ba'i las byed de/ smra ba dang / rtog pa dang / dpyod pa'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems kyis shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom
mo| |srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rnam par rtog pa med pas shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i
brtson 'grus dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / srid pa'i
rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad la mi rtog pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa kun la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 'du byed rnams la mi gnas
pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po gsum la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i
bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsum la shin tu brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor
lo zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa rnam
lnga yongs su bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgya
thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen
bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ dbang po drug la shin tu chags
pa'i| |bus pa chu bo lngas ni khyer ba/ shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom yang / /mkhas pa rnams kyis de la smod 'gyur/ /sems can dmigs shing zag dang bcas
la| |len par bcas shing brtson 'grus rtsom na/ /yang dag bsod nams zhing ma yin te/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma yin/ /mkhas pa brtson 'grus rtsom pa dag
ni| |chags pa thams cad ring du spangs te/ /sems ni ci la'ang mi gnas mi chags/ /yang dag bsod nams zhing zhes de bya/ /ming dang gzugs la chags pa med cing / /
phung po khams dang skye mched spangs te/ /thams cad 'khor gyi rten du 'gyur ba/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ 'jig rten spyod kyang chu zla bzhin te/ /'bad pa'i brtson
'grus rtsom pa'i mthar phyin/ /'khor lo 'di yis yongs su bcom pa/ /skye bo kun nas nyon mongs bcings pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa
lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba
dang | nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi go cha chen
po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub
sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bsam gtan gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa
pa dang / skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam
gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdom pa gsum la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par grol ba gsum la
gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas nas
bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dbang po lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / stobs lnga la gnas nas
bsam gtan sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang
sa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / chu'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / me'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rlung gi
khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom
pa dang / bde ba'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang
ma yin pa'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la
gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la gnas nas bsam
gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten 'di la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chung du la gnas nas bsam
gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chen po la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes tshad med pa la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa ste/ bsam gtan de dag ni zag pa dang
bcas pa/ nye bar len pa dang bcas pa/ chags pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya'o/ /bsam gtan 'di ni
nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong ba zhes bya ste/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang /
rang sang rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag par ma yin no/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gang zhe na/ 'di lta te/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /
'dod pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs kyi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams
dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdom pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par thar pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dran pa nye
bar gzhag pa bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang bral bar bsam
gtan sgom pa dang / dbang po lnga dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / stobs lnga dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang bral bar bsam
gtan sgom pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / chu'i khams dang
bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / me'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rlung gi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dang bral
bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde bar tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug bsngal
du tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin bde ba'ang ma yin par tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom
pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten 'di dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol dang bral bar
bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chung du dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chen po dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes tshad med pa dang bral bar
bsam gtan sgom pa ste/ bsam gtan 'di ni 'phags pa'i 'od zer chen po skyed pa/ zag pa med pa/ nye bar len pa med pa/ chags pa med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor
lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad
de bka' stsal pa/ bdag gi khur lci spong ba'i phyir ni/ /dmigs dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin bsgoms te/ /bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs gcod 'dod/ /yang dag mkhas pa'i
mtshan nyid ma yin/ /snod la rten cing rtog dang bcas pa/ /rnam par grol 'dod ting 'dzin sgom yang / /tshul rol pha rol mu la gnas na/ /sems can dag la phan don byed min/
sems can kun la phan dang bde phyir/ /ting 'dzin sgom zhing khur lci spongs te/ /kun nas nyon mongs thams cad sel ba/ /de ni yang dag mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid/ /sems can
thams cad sim par byed phyir/ /mi gnas pa yi ting 'dzin sgom ste/ /'dod pa'i srid pa thams cad chod pa/ /de ni blo gros chen po zhes bya/ /srid bas bcings pa thams cad
bkrol te/ /'jigs pa med pa'i grong du bzung phyir/ /rab tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin sgom pa/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o// //bam po bcu pa ste tha ma/ rigs
kyi bu| gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor
lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sang rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang / rang
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur
byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar na shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab la ni rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang /
'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i shes rab ce na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'i chos
klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / nyan pa dang / pha rol la ston cing 'chad pa 'ba' zhig la rten te/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel
bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis shes rab kyi sgron ma dbyung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos la shin tu 'bad pa'i
brtson 'grus kyis klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan dag la rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i
brtson 'grus kyis nan tan byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos la klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs
bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan dag la rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan du spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i theg pa chen po dang
ldan pa'i chos la brtson 'grus su klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan la'ang rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i brtson
'grus kyis nan tan byed pa ste/ 'phags pa'i zag pa med pa'i lam gyi yan lag tshol ba ma yin/ /'phags pa'i lam tshol ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam du gtogs pa'i
rnam par grol ba tshol ba ma yin/ rab tu zhi ba yang dag pa'i shes rab la nan tan byed pa ma yin te/ rtag tu lta ba dang bcas pa/ shes rab dang bcas pa'i shes rab la nan
tan byed do/ /de ltar len pa dang bcas pa/ chags pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi shes rab ces bya'o/ /shes rab de ni nyan thos dang /
rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab che na/ 'di lta te/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams byang chub kyi lam la brtson 'grus su nan tan byed pa ni ci nus su theg pa gsum gyi yang dag pa'i chos la klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du
'dri ba dang / gzhan dag la rgyas par ston cing 'chad kyang de la dmigs su med pa'i sbyor ba la gnas te/ mi g.yo ba dang / mi rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / nam mkha' lta
bu'i sems dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang / 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa med pa'i shes rab dang / chags pa med pa'i sems dang / skye ba dang / 'gog pa med pa'i sems dang / phyir mi
ldog pa'i sems dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sems dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sems dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sems dang / bdag med pa'i sems
dang | rnam par mi rtogs pa'i sems dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / bzod pa dang / rtog pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis grub pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i sa la shin tu thabs mkhas pas bde
bar gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa mi chags pa'i mchog dam pa'i blo gros kyi sa la thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa ste/ shes rab 'di ni len pa med pa
la chags pa med pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /
nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang /
rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa'i
go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan
thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang
sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar na thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs
kyi bu| byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas
pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don nam/ gzhan gyi don nam/ gnyis ka'i don la bdag dang / gzhan du rtog cing bzo dang / sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs
kyis bdag dang / gzhan gyi don yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos la mchod pa dang / bsnyen
bkur byed pa dang / pha dang / ma dang / nad pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / mgon dang / rten med pa dang / gnod pa mang pos sdug bsngal bar gyur pa mthong na shin tu thabs mkhas pas
sgrol zhing bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams zhes sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag theg pa chen po la gnas pas nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs
rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi dbang po yongs su ma smin pa la shin tu phra ba zab pa dam pa'i chos ston te/ slob tu gzhug pa
dang | 'phags pa'i bsam gtan la nan tan du byed du gzhug go /gzhan yang / don dam pa'i bden pa bstan te nan tan byed du gzhug pa dang / phyin ci
log bzhi las bzla zhing mi ltung ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid rig par bya ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gzhol bar bya ba nas/ gzhan yang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
brgyad pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / lhag ma ma lus pa'i lam dang / lam gyi 'bras bu'i bar du 'jug par bya ba la mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par byed do/ /
sems can gang khe dang / grags pa dang / longs spyod la chags te dbang po rgod pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa la ni mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / ma mo klog pa dang /
'don pa byed du gzhug pa dang / sangs rgyas gzhan gyis bshad pa las gzhan pa rnam par grol ba dang mthun pa'i gtsug lag klog cing 'don du bcug ste yongs su smin par byed
do| |sems can gang sbyin pa byed pa la mi mos pa la ni nor rin po che dang / nor dbyig rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bar bskul bas yongs su smin par byed do/ /sems can gang gtum pa
mi des pa'i rang bzhin can tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi slob tu skul ba dang / sems can gang zhe sdang can la bzod pa slob par skul ba dang / sems can gang le lo can la ni brtson 'grus
slob tu skul ba dang / sems can gang sems g.yeng ba la ni bsam gtan sgom par skul ba dang / sems can gang 'chal ba'i shes rab can la ni yang dag pa'i chos ston pas
bka' lung brda sprod cing lung 'bogs pa la thabs mkhas pas yongs su smin par byed do/ /sems can gang dkon mchog gsum la mngon par ma dad cing mi gnas pa dang / mi spyod
pa can la ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang / dge bsnyen pa'i sdom pa la bslab pa dang / bsnyen gnas pa'i sdom pa la bslab pas
yongs su smin par byed do/ /gzhan yang / bzo dang / sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas la slob cing spyod du btsud pas de yongs su smin par byed do/ /de la sogs pa byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pas ye shes kyi rnam pa ni chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed pas mang ngo / /de ltar yi ge dang / gtsug lag dang / bzo dang /
sgyu rtsal gyi las kyi gnas thams cad la lhag pa'i spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis mu stegs can dang / ston pa gzhan la zhugs pa thams cad btul
ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /thabs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba
yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gnas pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ thabs mkhas pa spyod pa'i gnas su gyur pa/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa lhun gyis grub pas rtog pa med pa'i phyir
ldog pa med pa'i chos su gyur pa'o/ /gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ston pa mkhas pa la'ang mi rten/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la'ang mi ltos par 'jig
rten gyi thabs mkhas pa la nan tan byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pas rmongs pa yin te/ ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni 'jig rten las
'das pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes la gzhol zhing gnas par yang mi nus la/ thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no/ /shin tu thabs mi
mkhas pas sems can gyi dbang po dang / spyod pa'i khyad par yang mi shes la/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa la'ang rmongs par gyur pas nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa dang / theg pa chen po'i dbang por ma smin pa dag la theg pa chen po ston pa dang / slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go /gang theg
pa chen po'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed
du bcug go /gang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go /
gang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni 'khor ba'i chos la bde ba dang / dga' bar ston te/ 'khor ba'i chos la skyo ba skyed par mi ston to/ /gzhan yang /
shin tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas sems can gang srog gcod pa la dga' ba nas de bzhin du log par lta ba'i bar du mos pa dag la ni shin tu zab pa theg pa chen po'i chos ston
te| de la 'khor ba 'di nas shi 'phos nas pha rol tu skye zhing sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa myong ba la skyo zhing 'jigs pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos spong ba mi ston
to| |gzhan yang / shin tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas sems can gang tshul khrims srung bar mos pa la ni sbyin pa spyod du 'jug go /sems can gang bzod pa sgom par mos pa la
ni bzod pa spong ba ston cing tshul khrims srung du 'jug go /sems can gang brtson 'grus rtsom par mos pa la ni brtson 'grus spong ba ston cing bzod pa spyod du 'jug go /sems can gang
bsam gtan sgom par mos pa la ni bsam gtan spong ba ston cing brtson 'grus la nan tan byed du bcug go /sems can gang shes rab sgom
par mos pa la ni shes rab spong ba ston cing bsam gtan sgom du 'jug go /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba
bzhin du sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don byed nus te/ sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa'i grogs por gyur to/ /thabs mkhas pa 'di ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa/
chags pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs
rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong pa yin te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don btang ste/ gzhan gyi don lhur byed pas bzo dang / sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par ston pas yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / pha dang / ma la bsnyen bkur dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / nad pa dang / phongs pa
nyam thag pa dang / mgon dang / skyabs med pa dang / shin tu sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos gzir ba la thabs kyis sgrol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis sems can yongs
su smin par byed do/ /ci la mos pa dang / dbang po dang / snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la dam pa'i chos ston to/ /gzhan yang / rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni rang sangs rgyas
kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed par skul ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni theg pa chen po slob cing nan tan byed par skul ba dang / gal te nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
kyi theg par dbang po ma smin pa ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi chos kyis skye ba ston cing 'khor bas skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba tshol bar skul lo/ /sems can gang srog gcod
pa la mos pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du chags pa la ni dbang po dang / rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor bar 'khor ba'i chos ston pa dang / 'jig rten 'di shi 'phos nas pha rol
tu skye ba 'di dang / pha rol gyi sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu myong bar ston te/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kyis 'jigs pa dang / skyo ba ston to/ /kha cig la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i
chos ston to/ /kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston to/ /kha cig la ni bla na med pa'i theg pa'i chos yang dag par bstan te khad
kyis slob tu 'jug go /sems can gang sbyin pa la mos par 'gyur ba rnams la ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mchog srung bar bstan pa de bzhin du rgyas par sems can gang
bsam gtan la mos par 'gyur ba la ni zag pa med pa 'phags pa'i lam gyi mchog gis bsdus pa dang / shes rab bla na med pa ston cing nan tan byed du bcug ste/ shin tu thabs
mkhas pas 'di ni dmigs pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes
bya'o| |rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa
rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang /
rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen
bkur bya ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ shes rab nan tan rnam gnyis te/ /'jig rten bcas dang
'jig rten 'das/ /chags pa de ni 'jig rten bcas/ /chags med pa ni 'jig rten 'das/ /shin tu thabs mkhas nan tan ni/ /khyad par rnam pa gnyis la gnas/ /dmigs pa
yod pa 'jig rten bcas/ /dmigs med de ni 'jig rten 'das/ /gang zhig theg pa gcig ston pa/ /de ni legs par chos ston min/ /bdag kyang yongs su mi smin na/ /gzhan gyi don
du ga la 'gyur/ /gcig tu mi dge sems can la/ /theg pa gsum gyi chos ston na/ /de ni gti mug rmongs pa ste/ /byang chub chen po de ma yin/ /theg pa gsum la 'jug spro zhing / /
yang dag pa yi chos 'dod la/ /'khor bas spro ba'i chos ston na/ /mkhas pa'i rang bzhin de ma yin/ /rtse gcig blo yis rab brtags te/ /'dod dang mos pa bzhin du ston/ /'di
ni shin tu thabs mkhas pas/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi de la bsngags/ /sems can sdig pa dag spyod cing / /theg pa gsum gyi snod 'gyur na/ /dbang po'i snod bzhin chos bstan te//
sdig pa kun las grol bar byed/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod do/ /byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar na byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/
byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa dang / sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa'o/ /chos la dmigs pa'i byams
pa ni| byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/ /sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni/ byams pa chen po'i go cha zhes mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems
can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong du gyur pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas ni bdag la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi
phyir sems can la dmigs pa'i bzod pa la nan tan byed pa'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas ni bdag zhi ba dang / bdag mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / bdag gi sgrib pa
bsal ba dang / bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs pa gcad pa'i phyir yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pas brtson 'grus la nan tan byed pa
nam yin no/ /de bas na byams pa 'di ni byams pa chen po zhes mi bya ste/ go cha chen po ma yin no/ /chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
dang thun mong ba ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'ba' zhig gis nan tan byed nus par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du brtson 'grus kyi sbyor bas chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa 'di la nan tan byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po ni sems can thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su gcad pa'i phyir shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis
chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed do/ /de bas na byams pa 'di ni byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' chos la dmigs
pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed pa ni phung po la mi gnas/ skye mched la mi gnas/ khams la mi gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas pa nas byang chub kyi lam gyi
yan lag gi bar du mi gnas so/ /'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams la mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas/
'jig rten 'di la mi gnas/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas/ tshu rol gyi mu la mi gnas/ pha rol gyi mu la mi gnas/ dmigs pa la mi gnas/ mi dmigs pa la mi gnas
te| de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa'i sa las shin tu 'das te/ de ni
byang chub sems dpa'i chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byams
pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin
tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /
srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang ni
rang rgyal ba/ /sems can dmigs pa'i byams sgom pa/ /sems la bcu gsum skyen 'chang zhing / /bdag la phan pa'i don phyir rtsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen ni/ /sems
can thams cad kun gyi phyir/ /thun mong ma yin byams chen bsgoms/ /bcu gsum sems kyi skyon rnams spangs/ /dri ma bcu gsum rab spangs nas/ /byang chub chen por gzhol bar
byed| |chos la dmigs pa'i byams bsgoms na/ /bsod nams zhing grub ring ba min/ /bcu gsum stobs la bder gnas na/ /sems can kun las shin tu 'phags/ /ji ltar
seng ge'i rgyal po de/ /ri dwags kun las 'phags pa bzhin/ /bcu gsum dgra rnams shin tu btul/ /rtag dang chad pa'i mthar 'dzin spangs/ /sems la cis kyang mi gos na/ /myur
du byang chub chen po 'thob/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pas nyan
thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba
dang | bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad ni bdag la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don
gyi phyir snying rje la spyod kyi/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po skyed pa ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag
'ba' zhig la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po bskyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po skyed do/ /de bas
na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo dang ldan pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur
ro| |byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byed
do| |snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir sbyin pas yongs su sdud pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ rin po che dang / nor dang / dbyig dang / theg pa dang
bran dang / las byed pa'i mi dang / yul dang / srid dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / lus dang / srog gi bar du yongs su gtong ba la ser sna med de/ mi dmigs pa'i spyod ba la sbyor bas
'dul ba'i sems can yod par mi mthong / sbyin pa byed par mi mthong / len par mi mthong / nor gyi dngos por mi mthong / sbyin pa spyod par mi mthong / sbyin pa byas pa'i 'bras bur
mi mthong ba nas mi dmigs pa'i bar du'ang mi mthong ste/ de lta bu'i snying rje chen po skyed do/ /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir ngag snyan pa dang / don sgrub pa
dang | don mthun pas ci dang / cis 'dul ba bzhin du mi dmigs pa'ang mi mthong ba'i bar du de dang / des rgyas par ston cing 'chad do/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pos rtag tu mchog dam pa'i dul ba'i sems dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang / tshad med pa'i sems dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad la mngon par 'du mi
byed pa'i sems kyis gang nas gang du skyes kyang g.yo ba med pa dang / mi gnas pa'i snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'dis snod du gyur pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin
par byed pa la skyo ba med do/ /de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba ma yin
no| |rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas
'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang /
rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur
byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ shin tu zab mo dam pa'i chos dag /snying rje chen
po'i gzhi ru de 'gyur/ /shin tu dpag dka' nam mkha' 'dra ste/ /gnas pa med de gzugs kyang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen po/ /yon tan chen po dang ni
ldan te/ /rgyal ba'i ye shes snying rje chen pos/ /dpa' bo 'jig rten 'da' bar des 'gyur/ /mgon dang skyabs med sems can dag ni/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnyog pas
bcings pa/ /snying rje chen po'i chu yis bkrus te/ /sems can rnam par grol bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje bskyed pas/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skems par byed de
nyan thos theg pa'i 'khor rnams dang ni/ /rang rgyal theg pa spyod pas ma yin/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sems can/ /ngan song dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba/ /snying rje chen po'i chu yis bkrus
te| |sdug bsngal kun las grol bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so so yang dag par rig pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam
pa| tshad med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ shin tu rgya chen po dang ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa chen
po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal te/
nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang
sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so so
yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa mtha' yas pa/ shin tu rgya che ba dang ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
dang | gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad
la shin tu rtog pa ni ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis nam mkha' kun tu khyab pa bzhin du/ sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ rten pa med pa/ mi gnas pa
gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sems kyi spyod pa med pa/ mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi
'dus te reg pa la yid kyis rnam par zhen pa dang bral ba/ sems kyi spyod pa med pa las mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba rnam gsum skyes te/ bde ba dang /
sdug bsngal dang / bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin par tshor ba la sems rab tu zhi zhing chags pa med do/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes
pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te
reg pa dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te
reg pa'i bar du gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa med do/ /sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa las
skyes pa'i tshor ba rnam gsum ste/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin par tshor ba la sems rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa med do/ /dus gsum gyi phung
po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad la len pa med pa/ sems kyi spyod pa med pa'o/ /gang ji snyed khams gsum dang / 'du byed gsum dang / reg bya gsum
dang | tshor ba gsum dang / dbang po gsum dang / theg pa gsum dang / sdom pa gsum dang / rnam par grol ba gsum dang / rnam pa de dag thams cad la sems rab tu zhi ba/ gnas
med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ len pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du gnas so/ /gang ji snyed sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes
rab dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la sems kyi spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhin dang / rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang sems kyi spyod pa med pa rab tu zhi bar gnas
so| |gang ji snyed dgu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la'ang sems kyis spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so/ /gzhan yang / mngon par
'du byed pa gsum dang / chos la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang / lam gyi yan lag dang / lam gyi rang bzhin 'dren par byed pa dag la'ang len pa med pa/ sems kyi spyod pa
med pa/ kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin pa dang / nye bar len pa dang bcas pa dang / nye bar len pa med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa
dang | zag pa med pa dang / tshu rol gyi mu dang / pha rol gyi mu dang / chung du dang / chen po dang / tshad med pa dang / byed pa dang / mi byed pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba
dang | lung du mi ston pa thams cad kyi rnam pa la len pa med pa dang / sems kyi spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so/ /gang ji snyed byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
thabs mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa nas srung bar bya ba med pa gsum dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du
chos thams cad kyi rnam pa la len pa med pa/ sems kyi spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis
tshor ba rnam gsum gyi nyes pa yongs su bsal ba dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad yongs su zhi ba dang / mtshan ma'i chos thams cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / ji
snyed nam mkha'i mig dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'ang 'dren par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
lo de la gnas pas gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor
ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bsal te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi myong bar byed do/ /gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ mun pa nag pos nam mkha'
thams cad yog pa na nyi ma shar ba'i tshe mun pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'ang tshigs so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam
pa| tshad med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya chen po dang ldan pas ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu
brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'ang grub cing 'dren par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / nam mkha'i mig dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs
mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la gnas pa dpag tu med pa nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi nyi mas phyin ci log bzhi'i mun pa yongs su bsal te/
'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang / gzhan yang / srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad
lhag ma ma lus par yongs su sel te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu myong bar mi byed do/ /gzhan yang / de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la dbang thob pa dang / phyir
mi ldog par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du mi 'gro zhing rjes su mi spyod pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos
kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / yon tan thams
cad la sems mi ngoms pa nas byang chub kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad de/ rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba ni chung du na rmi lam du'ang bar chad med par 'gyur ro/ /
rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshigs so so yang dag par rig pas nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa/ mtha' yas
pa| yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pas ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i
'khor lo 'dren par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du snyoms par 'jug pa dang / nam mkha'
mtha' yas skye mched nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na tshor ba rnam gsum dang / 'du byed gsum po yongs su bcad de/ mngon par 'du byed pa dang / g.yo ba'i sems kyi spyod pa
med pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa dang / rig pa dang / yid la byed pa la sogs pa kun gcod par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na zhag gcig
gam| zhag bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi zas za bar 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin de las langs na'ang sems rab tu zhi ba len pa med cing / lhan ner gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
gzhan yang don dam pa'i mthas gtugs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog go /ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na sems rab tu mnyam pas nam mkha' ltar
chags pa med pa dang / lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga kun nas zil dngar gyi thigs pa skar ma snar ma lta bu mngon par byung bas kun nas nyon mongs pas
bcings pa'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas yang dag pa'i dran pa thob ste/ dga' ba khyad par can gyis lus la khyab
par gyur pa ni ji ltar lha'i sras po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'jug pa nas lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu kun nas rab tu bde ba myong
ba bzhin de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de lus la bde bas reg pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas sangs rgyas mthong ba las mtshan
ma gzhan mthong ba med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe sangs rgyas gcig yid la byas na sangs rgyas gcig mthong ngo / /gal te sangs rgyas mang po yid la byas na
sangs rgyas mang po mthong ngo / /gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku chung bar yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi sku chung dur mthong ngo / /gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku chen por yid la byas na
sangs rgyas kyi sku chen por mthong ngo / /gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med par yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med par mthong ngo / /gal te bdag gi lus sangs
rgyas kyi sku'i mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na bdag gi lus de sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong ngo / /gal te gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi skur
yid la byas na gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun su mtshogs par mthong ngo / /gal te sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa dang / ji snyed gzugs
su gtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa dang / ji snyed gzugs su gtogs pa thams
