cad sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong gi gzugs gzhan du mi mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe'ang 'di snyam du chos thams cad
dang | gzugs thams cad ni sgyu ma dang 'dra ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pas bdag gis tshor ba rnam gsum dang / 'du byed gsum la sogs pa chos thams cad lhag ma ma
lus par yongs su gcad do snyam nas 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas blo sngon du btang ba bzhin du thams cad yongs su
bcad de ting nge 'dzin gyi ro'i zas kyis 'tsho'o/ /gal te na zhag bdun nam/ zhag bdun gnyis sam/ bdun gsum mam/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ drug gam/ bdun nam/
brgyad dam/ gal te bskal pa tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du ci nus su gnas te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi zas za'o/ /ting nge 'dzin
de las langs nas sems rab tu zhi bas ci la'ang mi chags te bde bar gnas so/ /gal te don dam pa'i mthas gtugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs na'ang sngar ji
skad bshad pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang ldan pa yid la bya ba nas chos thams cad dang / gzugs thams cad sgyu ma dang 'dra ste yang dag pa ma yin
pa'i bar du chud par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam
pa| tshad med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs thams cad
dang | shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na nam mkha'i mig dang / spyi
bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams las shin tu thabs mkhas pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par spangs te rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu len par mi byed
do| |gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams su mes 'jig pa 'byung du nye ba ni nyi ma lnga gcig car shar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams na rdzing bu dang / rdzing
bu chen po dang / 'bab chu dang / 'bab chu chen po dang / mtsho dang / mtsho chen po'i chu rnams lhag ma ma lus par thams cad skems par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' 'ang tshigs so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brten pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'ang mngon par 'dren to/ /gzhan yang / nam mkha'i
mig dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la'ang gnas shing 'dren par 'gyur ro/ /gang 'das
pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te/ ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las
thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bskams te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len par byed do/ /gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten du chu'i
'jig pa byung ba na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chu 'di'i khams chung du'i gling chen po bzhi dang / gling phran brgyad
dang | ri rab ri'i rgyal po dang / ri phran thams cad chu yis bkrus te zhig nas lhag ma ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang
tshigs so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pas ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'ang 'grub cing 'dren par 'gyur ro/ /nam
mkha'i mig dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la gnas shing 'dren par 'gyur bas 'das pa'i
dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang / gzhan yang / srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba 'khor ba'i las la mkhas
pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'ang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo 'di la gnas pas dpag tu med pa nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi nyi ma 'byung bas rang gi lus
la phyin ci log bzhi dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad yongs su sel bar 'gyur ro/ /'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro mnar
med pa dang / gzhan yang / srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad kyang lhag ma ma lus par yongs su sel te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'ang myong
bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal
te| nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang /
nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis sangs
rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du mi 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral
zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen
bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / yon tan thams cad la sems mi ngoms pa ste/ mngon par byang chub kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad pa
dang | rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba ni chung du na rmi lam na'ang 'bral bar mi byed do/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bsod nams dang / ye shes
kyi tshogs kyang myur du rdzogs pa dang / ring po mi thogs par rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs
rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can thams cad kyang rdzus te skye ba dang / mtshan dang / gzugs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba/ nyon mongs pa srab
cing chung ba/ theg pa chen po la bde bar gnas pa sha stag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal
pa| chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag /nyon mongs thams cad yongs su gcad par bya/ /yang dag stong pa nyid la snyoms zhugs na/ /dngos po gang yang bye bar
dka' ba min/ /srid pa'i bcings pa thams cad gcad pa'i phyir/ /snyoms par 'jug la nan tan brtson par bya/ /ting 'dzin yon tan dag dang ldan pas na/ /gdon mi
za bar dpag dka'i shes rab thob/ /gzugs med pa yi bsam gtan rab sgom zhing / /'gog pa'i ting 'dzin stong pa nyid brtags na/ /sangs rgyas dran pa'i blo mchog rab skyes
te| |sdig pa thams cad yongs su zad 'gyur ro/ /yod dang med pa'i chos rnams thams cad ni/ /yang dag stong pa nyid du brtags pas bcom/ /ngan par 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams/
yongs bsal nas/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas mang po mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang dag stong pa nyid la rab bsgoms pas/ /dge ba'i chos gzhan kun la brtson bya ste/ /sangs rgyas thams
cad kun la rab mchod ni/ /myur du sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /sems can kun gyi dge ba'i grogs byas te/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa yi nad bsal na/ /rnam dag
sangs rgyas zhing du myur du skye/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya byang chub chen po 'thob/ /sangs rgyas mtshan dang ldan pa'i sems can dag /sangs rgyas zhing der yongs su gang bar 'gyur
thams cad sangs rgyas theg la 'dun pa ste/ /nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa yongs su spong / /'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las /
bsod nams kyi zhing gi mtshan nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa chen po'i rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas rjes
su dran pa la goms pa dag deng 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la nan tan bya ba'i sbyor ba bshad pa thos nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge
'dzin gyi sgo mo thams cad thob bo/ /gzhan yang / sems can tshad med grangs med pa rnams chos 'di thos nas ting nge 'dzin gyi 'tsho ba me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
kyi sgo mo thams cad thob bo/ /gzhan yang / sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas dpa' bar 'gro ba glog gi 'od la rten pa
zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo mo thams cad thob bo/ /gzhan yang / sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas chos la sgyur ba 'od snang
ba las rten par byed pa rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thams cad thob bo/ /gzhan yang / sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas rdul dang / dri ma
dang bral te chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa skyes te rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /gzhan yang / /sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag ni bcom ldan 'das
kyis bshad pa thos nas lan gcig phyir ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /gzhan yang / sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas phyir
mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /gzhan yang / sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas mchog gi dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /
gzhan yang / sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas khams gsum gyi btson ra nas 'byung bar rtsom pas bcom ldan 'das la rten
cing rab tu byung nas yang dag pa'i chos la zhugs par gyur to/ /gzhan yang / sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag nam 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar
gnas shing nyan thos kyi theg par sems bskyed pas phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /gzhan yang / sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas
nam 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar gnas nas rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par sems bskyed pa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /gzhan yang / sems can tshad
med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas nam 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar gnas nas theg pa chen por sems bskyed cing bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /gzhan yang / sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa
thos nas 'jig rten gyi yang dag par lta ba thob par gyur te/ yang dag par lta ba de'i dbang gis ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgyu dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las dang / nyon
mongs pa thams cad byang nas mtho ris su 'gro ba'i rgyu dang / yang dag pa'i smon lam dang / dge ba'i las thams cad skye zhing 'phel bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang / sems
can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ste/ dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa blangs nas sangs rgyas mchod
pa la spro ba dang / chos thos pa la dga' ba dang / dge 'dun gyi g.yog byed pa la mos te/ nyin mtshan du 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus la sems bar chad med par gyur to/ /gzhan
yang / sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas log pa la 'bab pa dang / log pa la phyogs pa dang / blo gros ngan pa dang / las ngan pa thams
cad yongs su spangs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mi 'gyur ba'i dad pa thob nas khyim na gnas pa'i chos yongs su spangs te rnam par dag pas rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba brda sprod pa chen
po chos kyi sgo mo 'di khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyi/ khyod kyis gzungs su zungs la shin tu rgyas par gyis shig /sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la klog gam/ 'don tam /
yid la byed dam/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher 'chad ngam/ yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dag la khyod kyis chos rnam pa 'di bcus bsrungs te/ yun ring por phan pa dang / bde ba'i
don thob par gyis shig /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i thabs dang / bdog pa'i nor thams cad bsrungs te nyams par mi bya ba dang / gnod pa thams cad las bsrungs te
med par bya ba dang / log par lta ba dang / log par phyogs pa las bsrungs te mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam spang bar bya ba dang / de'i lus dang / ngag la gnod pa thams cad las
bsrungs te med par bya ba dang / 'phya ba dang / skur pa thams cad las bsrungs te med par bya ba dang / tshul khrims dang / spyod pa thams cad nyams par mi 'gyur bar bsrung ba dang /
de la mi ma yin pa thams cad dang / 'byung ba chen po 'khrugs pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i nad dang / mi dge ba thams cad yongs su sel bar srung ba dang / de la dus ma yin pa/ tshul ma yin
pa| ltas ngan dang / rims thams cad mi 'byung bar srung ba dang / de la 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na'ang sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar srung ba dang / de tshe 'phos
nas kyang bde 'gror skye ba dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i don thob par yongs su srung bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / don yid
la byed pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher 'chad dam/ yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dag la khyod kyis chos rnam pa 'di bcu shin tu bsrungs shing / byin gyis brlabs te/ chos rnam pa 'di
bcus yun ring por phan pa dang / bde bar gyis shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de de
bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs gzungs su 'dzin cing shin tu rgyas par bgyi'o/ /sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / don
yid la bgyid pa dang / pha rol po la rgya cher ston pa dang / yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dag la bdag gis chos rnam pa 'di bcus shin tu bsrungs te yun ring por phan pa dang / bde bar
bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di gsungs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs par the
tshom 'dri ba dang / tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa 'khor mang po thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o/ /'dus pa chen po las byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'khor
lo bcu pa las/ bde ba'i don thob pa yongs su gdams pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad do/ /'dus pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg

pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya'i mkhan po ha shang zab mo la sogs pa dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de rnam par mi rtog gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+yA bai brta tsakra nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang
chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin
gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nam gyi cha smad kyi thun la 'od dri ma med
pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur par kun tu snang byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nam gyi cha smad kyi thun nam nangs kar
gnas khang nas byung ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang ga la ba der song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas
khang du 'jug par bsam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi bzhugs khang gi khor yug nas pad+ma khri byung ba mthong zhing glu'i sgra chen po'ang thos so/ /pad+ma de dag las kyang 'od byung
ba mthong ngo / /'od des kyang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang bar byed pa mthong ngo / /mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po thams cad dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang bar gyur par mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang du mi 'gro bar bsams pa
dang | zhugs par gyur cing bdag nyid 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mdun na 'dug par shes te/ des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug par mthong
ngo| |mthong nas kyang se gol gtogs na ma langs so/ /de nas lud pa'i sgra phyung na'ang ma langs te/ des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho 'phrul mthong nas/ bdag rgya mtsho
chen po'i nang na gnas pa snyam du shes shing 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas gnas khang dang bcas te shar phyogs su 'gro ba mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang
ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing 'dug pa dang / des 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa shar phyogs su gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams las 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyir mi ldog pa'i dbyings zhes bya bar phyin par mthong
ngo| |de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis khebs pa'i pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i sku zhes bya bar mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spu'i khung bu rnams nas pad+ma dag byung ste/

pad+ma de dag gis dpag tshad khrir khyab pa mthong ngo / /pad+ma de dag kyang shin tu rgyas shing 'dab ma stong dang ldan par mthong ngo / /pad+ma'i snying po de dag la'ang byang chub sems dpa' mtshan sum cu
rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ lus kyis mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dag 'khod par mthong de/ /de'i nang na pad+ma chen po gcig las bcom ldan 'das byung nas
stong par gyur te/ pad+ma chen po de la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug nas/ pad+ma chen po de dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ mngon par 'phags nas bcom
ldan 'das de la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ pad+ma chen po de nyid la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyis khebs pa'i pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i skus mkhyen bzhin du/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa/ khyod da gzod gang nas 'ongs/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyis khebs pa'i pad+ma rab
tu rgyas pa'i sku la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed nas mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i rim gro pa byang chub sems dpa'
sgra snyan ces bya ba de/ pad+ma'i stan de las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang
pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi
mdzad de ji srid cig na mchis/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyis khebs pa'i pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i skus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra
snyan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na'o/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na bcom ldan 'das gang chos ston/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni chos ston pa ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ bka' stsal pa/ theg pa gsum la brtsams te'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
theg pa gsum po de dag gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po ste/ theg pa gsum po de dag la brtsams nas/ bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de chos ston to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams
cad kyi chos bstan pa mthun pa ma lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa ni mthun no/ /gsol pa/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa ji tsam zhig mthun/ bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi
'khor lor mthun no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de theg pa gsum la brtsams te de ltar chos ston/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sems
can de dag ni dman pa la mos pa dag ste/ de dag theg pa gcig la mi 'jug pas na thabs mkhas pas/ de dag de ltar nye bar khrid de/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams ni thabs mkhas pa chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de ni snyig ma lnga'i dus na byung ste/ de dag ni theg pa gcig la ma mos pa dag go /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni chos ston
pa ni de ltar tshogs che lags pa lta/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de lta'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag der ma skyes pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs pa rnyed pa lags so/ /bka'
stsal pa| rigs kyi bu/ de skad ma zer cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang zhig 'dir lo nyi khri dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par
bsgrub pa bas/ gang zhig der snga dro gcig gis de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du yang dag par sgrub bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de de tsam du kun nas nyon mongs pa can
du gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ji tsam du kun nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i kun
nas nyon mongs par gyur pa ji tsam pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i kun nas nyon mongs pa mnyan na/ khyod kyi tshe'i tshad zad par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra snyan
kyis de'i tshe rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma dag blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su gtor to/ /
gtor nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de blta'o zhes tshig tu yang dang / yang smras so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de mthong bar 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong bar 'tshal lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di
dang lhan cig song zhig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgra snyan gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de blta'o/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ re zhig kho bos phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /
smras pa| kho bo'ang khyod dang lhan cig tu phyag bya'o/ /bsnyen bkur du bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas 'od zer gyis khyab pa'i pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i sku la phyag btsal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa
las brkyang ba'am/ brkyang pa las bskum pa de bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams der mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gan du byung ste/ thams cad na'ang chos bstan pa 'di nyid byung ngo / /lho phyogs dang / nub dang / byang
dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams rnams su'ang de bzhin te/ 'on kyang dzam+bu'i gling 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir nam ma nangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
dga' bo gnas khang gi nang na 'dug bzhin du skar khung gi gseb nas 'od byung bar mthong nas/ de gnas khang nas 'byung ngo snyam ste/ khri las langs pa dang / nyi ma ma shar bar rgyal
bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang bar gyur par mthong ngo / /rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad chu dang ba/ sngo ba/ gsal pas gang ba dang / 'di na shing yang med/ gtsug lag
khang yang med par mthong nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ ji ltar sngon ma byung ba'i snga ltas 'di dag snang ba las na/ deng ni chos chen po zhig ston par 'gyur ro snyam mo//
de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di snyam du bsams te/ rkang pas la gzhag go snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rkang pas la gzhag na gsher ba'ang med/
bying ba'ang med nas de dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bzhugs khang ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi bzhugs khang gi khor
yug nas pad+ma khri mthong zhing / rol mo'i sgra chen po dang / glu'i sgra chen po'ang thos so/ /pad+ma de dag las kyang 'od byung bar mthong ste/ 'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar gyur pa mthong nas/ de dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal

to| |phyag btsal ba dang nam nangs te/ nyi ma shar bar gyur to/ /de dag gi nang nas pad+ma gcig rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi dbus su song ste 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
pad+ma de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi dbus su 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di snyam du bsams te/ chos ston pa'i snga ltas byung gi /bdag bcom
ldan 'das kyi gdan shom du 'gro'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams ma thag tu sa chen po'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/ /rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad
kyang me tog gis khyab par khebs par gyur to/ /me tog dang bcas pa dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams kyang byung bar gyur to/ /dge slong thams cad kyang gnas khang
nas 'byung bar bsams pa dang / rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad chu dwang ba sngo ba gsal bas gang bar mthong nas/ de dag 'byung ba'am/ ldog par yang mi nus la/ 'di na
shing dang / gtsug lag khang yang ma mthong gi snang ba chen po mthong nas/ de dag gnas khang de nyid na 'dug bzhin du 'di snyam du sems te/ de'i snga ltas 'di dag snang ba las na/
deng chos chen po zhig ston par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das bzhugs ma thag tu
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag grangs med pa rnams dang lhan cig tu sa rum nas mngon par 'thon te/ 'thon nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod song la mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge
bsnyen ma ji srid cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad bos shig /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so zhes gsol te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ gtsug lag

khang nas gtsug lag khang du rgyu zhing song ste/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyed la ston pa gsung ngo / /de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis kyang snga ltas rig mod kyi 'gro ma nus

so| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad chu dwang pa/ sngo ba/ gsal bas gang bar mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong de dag gi ltar mnyan nas/ bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong dag ni mchi ba'i
rngo mi thogs so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal bas bar chab dwang ba/ sngo ba/ gsal bas gtams par mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ dge slong
de dag ni chu ma yin pa la chur 'du shes pa dag ste/ ji ltar dge slong de dag chu ma yin pa la chur 'du shes pa de bzhin du/ de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin
ba la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur 'du shes/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin pa la lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin pa la phyir mi 'ong
ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu ma yin pa la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bur 'du shes/ rang sangs rgyas nyid ma yin pa la rang sangs rgyas 'du shes/ gzugs ma yin
pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ tshor ba ma yin pa dang / 'du shes ma yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa ma yin pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dag ste/
kun dga' bo/ khyod song la bos shig dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ yang dge slong de dag bod pa'i phyir mnyan du
yod pa'i grong khyer chen por zhugs nas dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsgo ba/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /khyed la ston pa
gsung ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'khor bzhi po dag la bsgo nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor bzhi la bsgo lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud+gal gyi bu/
khyod song la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa rnams dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen

dang | dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa ji snyed 'khod pa
de dag thams cad bos shig /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so zhes gsol te/ tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs
dang ldan pas log pa bskum pa las brkyang pa'am/ brkyang pa las bskum pa de bzhin du skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la maud+gal gyi bu chen pos/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang /
gnod sbyin rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / mi rnams dang / mi ma yin pa rnams la bsgo
nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / bdag nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor bzhi la bsgo lags so/ /de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis dpag tshad stong khor yug tu khyab par gyur to/ /lha rnams kyis kyang dpag tshad lnga khri tsam gyi steng
gi bar snang khyab par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor bzhi po 'di'ang 'dus shing mchis/
lha rnams kyis kyang bar snang gtams shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo la
brtsams te chos bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor 'di na dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag kyang mang / lha brgya stong phrag kyang mang /
de ma lags pa gzhan gang dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa
dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bur 'du shes pa dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid du 'du shes pa mang du mchis na/ de dag gi 'du shes rnam par dgrol ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das

kyis gang la dgongs te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu bstan pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis gang la dgongs te/ rang sangs rgyas nyid bstan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mdang 'dir nam gyi cha smad la mchis langs nas/ gnas khang nas byung ste/ 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang ga la ba der mchis nas son te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang du 'jug ces bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bzhugs khang mthong ste/ bcom

ldan 'das kyi bzhugs khang gi khor yug nas pad+ma khri'ang mthong / rol mo'i sgra chen po dang / glu'i sgra chen po thos/ pad+ma de dag las 'od byung ba'ang mthong / 'od des rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
thams cad dga' bar gyur pa dang / mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer thams cad dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gda' bar gyur pa'ang mthong na/ bcom ldan 'das/
'di su'i snga ltas lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni gang gi phyir 'jam dpal gyis bskul
ba'i chos 'di bstan pa'i snga ltas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mdang
'dir nam gyi cha smad kyi thun la gnas khang gi nang na mchis bzhin du skar khung gi gseb nas 'od mchis pa mthong nas bdag gnas khang nas 'byung snyam ste khri las langs pa dang /
gdugs ma shar bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal bas bar gda' bar gyur cing / rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal bas bar chab dwang ba/ sngo ba gsal bas gtams la 'di na zhugs shing
yang ma mchis/ gtsug lag khang yang ma mchis par mthong na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ni
gang gi phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bskul ba rnyog pa med pa'i chos bstan pa 'di'i snga ltas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal dbyangs ni 'jigs med pa/ /'di yis gang phyir dris pa yi/ /ye shes 'di ni rnyog pa med/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na
med| |'jam dpal dbyangs ni 'jigs med pa/ /ye shes ldan pas gang phyir dris/ /ye shes 'di ni rnam rtog med/ /spros pa med cing zag pa med/ /'di las dngos po
grub pa med/ /ma grub pa'ang de bzhin no/ /thams cad spangs pa'i ye shes ni/ /'jam dpal dang la gyis yongs su dris/ /'di la 'bras bu grub pa med/ /rnam pa kun tu med par brjod/ /
'di ni 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon/ /skyob pa rnams kyi ldem po dag /'jam dbyangs 'jigs pa med pa yis/ /gang gi ched du yongs dris pa/ /'di la sgra ni med pa ste/ /sgra rnams thams
cad mnyam par gyur/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ 'jam dpal gzhon
nur gyur pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i slad du yongs su zhu lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyir
mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba dag go /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas ci la dgongs te/ dad pas rjes su 'brang ba bstan/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba bstan/
de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ci la dgongs te/ brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig
phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / nyan thos dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas bstan/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas gang la dgongs te/ dad pas rjes su 'brang
ba yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas gang la dgongs te/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan
gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / nyan thos dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas yongs su bstan pa de/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems
dpa'i chos nyid kyang de nyid lags par de ltar yongs su bstan tam/ ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de de bzhin te/ de
bzhin gshegs pas de dag nyid byang chub sems dpa'i chos zhes de skad yongs su bstan to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ snyigs ma lnga'i tshe skyes pa'i sems can
dag ni dman pa la mos pa dag ste/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ma mos pas/ kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thabs la mkhas pa dag thabs mkhas
pas de ltar de dag la chos ston to/ /kun dga' bo/ sems can gang dag rgya chen po la mos pa de dag ni nyung ste/ kun dga' bo/ sems can gang dag dman pa la mos pa de
dag gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa thabs mkhas pa de lta bus chos ston te/ thabs 'dis sangs rgyas kyi chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
stsal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa cang
mi gsung bas 'da' bar mdzad/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ sems can gang dag chos bstan pa 'di lta bu la mos pa de dag ni nyung ngo / /dgra bcom pa'o snyam
pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom pa 'di dag ni shin tu mang ngo / /btsun pa kun dga' bo/ /sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas kyis ci la dgongs te/ chos bstan ces de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs te gsungs pa kun tu shes pa de dag ni nyung ngo / /kho bo ni 'di la mngon sum mo/ /'khor bzhi po de dag
ji ltar da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnam par gzhag pa mdzad ces bya ba nas/ de bzhin du rgya cher rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du rnam par gzhag pa mdzad ces the
tshom du gyur pa dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas ci la dgongs te/ dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yongs su bstan ces bya ba nas/ de bzhin
gshegs pas ci la dgongs te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du yongs su bstan ces dpyod par 'gyur pas chu thams cad kyang thogs shing mi 'bab/ bya rnams kyang nam mkha' la mi
'phur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos bstan pa 'di ni mos par dka' ba ste/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung bas 'da' bar mdzad do/ /de nas pad+ma khri bo
de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs khang gi khor yug tu yongs su 'gro ste/ de dag las bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu las chos bstan pa 'dis
phyogs 'di nyid du thos lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i chos bstan pa
la brtsams te/ chos bstan du gsol zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob cig ces sgra de lta bu byung ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba
btab pa/ bdag gis ma dang nam gyi cha smad kyi thun la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig shar phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs ma mchis pa dag las
chos bstan pa 'di nyid thos shing / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs ma
mchis ba dag las chos bstan pa 'di nyid thos lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i chos bstan pa bshad du gsol/ de nas bar snang la gnas pa'i
lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu rtsa lngas de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa/ bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dag las chos bstan pa
'dis phyogs 'di nyid du thos lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i chos bstan
pa bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gang la dgongs te/ dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yongs
su bstan pa dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin du rgya cher brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / nyan thos
dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas yongs su bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan
'das| 'khor bzhi po lud pa'i sgra'ang mi 'byin par cang mi smra bar mchis pa 'di dag dang / bcom ldan 'das/ srog chags brgya stong mang po the tshom dang / som nyi 'tshal bar gyur te/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ci la dgongs nas dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yongs su bstan cing de bzhin du rgya cher rang sangs rgyas kyi
bar du yongs su bstan snyam pa de dag gi the tshom bsal du gsol/ mang po 'di dag ni dbang du gyur pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni dbang dang bcas par
chos ston to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang ni chos yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni chos kyi stobs dang ldan pa ste/ de dag gis chos de dag ji lta bar mngon du byas pa de ltar bstan to/ /kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir
legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po la dad pas rjes su 'brang bar yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin du chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig
phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / nyan thos dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su yongs su bstan pa ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so zhes gsol te/
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po de sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag chags pa med par sangs rgyas mthong bar bya ba'i phyir yang dag par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang yang
dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / de gzugs la mi chags/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa 'di ni/ kun
dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad pas rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de chos
'di dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis stong par bshad par yid ches par byed na/ kun dga' bo/ de ltar mos
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs
rgyas kyi ye shes la yid ches par byed cing / de la 'dod pa'ang skyed la/ nam zhig na bdag ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur snyam du ye shes de'ang
yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dad pas rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i ming thob bo/ kun dga' bo/ gzhan yang / byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dad pa ma yin la/ dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa rjes su thob na/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po de dad pas rjes su 'brang bar rig par bya'o/ /yang ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byin pa ltar chos kyi sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa sbyin par bya ba gang yin pa de
lta bur nam zhig na 'gyur zhig gu snyam zhing chos kyi sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la'ang yid ches par byed na/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
de'ang dad pas rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis btang ba thams cad yongs su
gtong ba yin te/ de lus kyang yongs su gtong yang sbyin pas dag par mi sems shing thams cad du'ang ser sna med pa yin la de thams cad kyang byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing
byang chub de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas la dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ sems rnyog pa med pa yin/ rnyog pa med pa'i chos la yid ches pa yin/ skye mched drug kyang mi 'dor la/ de de
dag don du gnyer ba'ang ma yin/ dad pas mos pa yin/ sems can gang dag dad pa dang mi ldan pa de dag kyang dad pa la 'dzud cing sangs rgyas kyi chos la dad par byed pa yin/ dad
pa dang ldan par gyur nas kyang byang chub tu sems skyed cing sems de'ang mi rnyed pa yin/ dad nas mnyam pa nyid du shes shing chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du shes
te| de ni ji ltar shes zhe na/ de ni tha snyad kyi chos kyi dbyings so zhes brjod par bya ste/ dbyings de'ang mi rnyed/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal
ba dang / 'du byed thams cad stong pa dang / 'du byed thams cad bdag gi ba med par yid ches par byed cing de la'ang stobs bskyed pa thob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i tshul khrims la
yid ches pa yin/ spros pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par zhugs pa yin/ sems can thams cad 'gog pa'i dbyings su mnyam mo zhes 'gog pa'i dbyings la yid
ches pa yin/ dad pa gang gis yid ches pa de'i mtshan nyid kho nar yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing mi chags so/ /ma chags nas kyang sems can thams cad
chos kyi dbyings su mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong la chos kyi dbyings de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings nyid sems can thams cad
kyi sems med pa'i dbyings te/ de de ltar yid ches shing chos de dag ji lta bar sems kyang de bzhin du yid ches par byed de/ de lta bu ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o/ /kun
dga' bo/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang dag par na sems can thams cad gang la'ang mi gnas par yid ches shing sems can thams cad
rang bzhin gyis stong pas/ de dag gi gnas kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de
ltar dad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /
sangs rgyas mthong ba chags med la/ /sems can dpag med dad par byed/ /de ni de la chags pa med/ /de phyir blo ldan dad pas 'brang / /chos 'di thams cad stong pa zhes/ /rab
tu bshad par yid kyang ches/ /de ni de yi mos yin te/ /de phyir dad pas 'brang bar 'dod/ /bde gshegs ye shes yid ches te/ /nam zhig 'di 'drar shes ldan zhes/ /de la 'dod pa
'jug byed cing / /shes pa de yang mthong ma yin/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa la/ /rtag tu dad pa ma yin te/ /dad pa'i stobs ni rjes thob pa/ /de phyir dad pas 'brang bar gsungs/ /
ji ltar bcom ldan byin pa ltar/ /chos sbyin bsam gyis mi khyab 'di/ /sbyin pa nam zhig sbyin snyam pa/ /de phyir dad pas 'brang bar gsungs/ /de ni slong la dad pa yis/ /lus dang thams
cad gtong bar byed/ /sbyin la byin pa'i 'du shes med/ /de phyir brtan pa dad pas 'brang / /dad pas thams cad gtong byed cing / /thams cad la yang ser sna med/ /de dag thams
cad byang chub gzhol/ /byang chub de yang mthong ma yin/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la dad pa dang / /de yi sems ni rnyog pa med/ /sems med pa yi chos ston to/ /de phyir dad pas 'brang
bar gsungs/ /sems can gang dag dad mi ldan/ /de dag dad la 'dzud byed cing / /dri med chos la dad par byed/ /de phyir dad pas 'brang bar gsungs/ /dad pa'i sems dang
ldan gyur nas/ /sems ni byang chub 'jug par byed/ /sems de yang ni mi rnyed de/ /de phyir brtan pa dad pas 'brang / /chos kyi dbyings ni rtag mnyam par/ /dad pas mnyam pa
nyid du shes/ /dbyings de yang ni mi rnyed la/ /dbyings zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa'ang med/ /'du byed thams cad mi rtag dang / /sdug bsngal stong pa bdag
med par/ /yid ches de yis stobs bskyed pas/ /de phyir dad pas 'brang bar gsungs/ /zag med tshul khrims yid ches la/ /rnyog pa med cing spros med pa/ /zhi ba'i dbyings la
mnyam bzhag pa/ /de phyir blo ldan dad pas 'brang / /sems can thams cad dbyings med dang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings yid ches/ /dad pa gang gis yid ches pa/ /dad pa de
yang de'i mtshan nyid/ /chos kyi dbyings la chags med pas/ /sems can dbyings kyang mthong ma yin/ /ye shes ldan pa chos kyi dbyings/ /bsam gyis mi khyab de mi mthong //
byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/ /chos 'di ji ltar 'di 'dra bar/ /de ltar dad pas yid ches la/ /de phyir dad dang ldan pas gsungs/ /yang dag nyid du sems can
kun| |de dag ngo bo nyid kyis stong / /gang na'ang gnas pa ma yin te/ /de dag gnas ni yod ma yin/ /sems can thams cad mya ngan 'das/ /yang dag tu na de yang stong / /des
na mya ngan 'das pa de/ /stong pa nyid du yongs su brjod/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/ /'phags te de ltar yid ches te/ /des na dad pas rjes 'brang zhes/ /grags
ldan rnams kyis ming thob bo/ /dad pas rjes su 'brang rnams kyi/ /dad pa de ni 'di 'drar gsungs/ /kun dga' khyod kyis de ltar zungs/ /de ltar 'di ni rab tu shod/ /kun dga' chos rnams
'di dag dang / /gzhan yang mang po mtha' yas pa/ /chos de dag gis blo ldan pa/ /dad pas rjes su 'brang ba bstan/ /kun dga' bo/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad pas rjes su 'brang bar yongs su bstan te/ thabs mkhas pas don de nye bar khrid do// //
bam po gnyis pa/ kun dga' bo/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rjes su
'brang bar yongs su bstan ce na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las mi ldog ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang
'dzin cing rab tu ston la/ dbyings de las kyang mi 'da' zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rnams kyang rjes su thob pa yin/ bsti stang du byas te de 'dzin cing de'i sems zhum pa med pa
yin| chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi rgyun de'ang ston la gang du yang mngon par zhen pa med/ ci nas chos rnams dang / chos ma yin pa rnams la'ang mi chags par gnas pa med pa dang /
rten med pa'i chos nyid kyang ston/ chos 'dod pa yin gyi chos ma yin pa 'dod pa ma yin/ 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul du chos thams cad 'dzin te/ bzung nas kyang
rab tu ston to/ /des shing 'grogs na bde ba yin no/ /zhi ba'i chos de'ang rab tu ston la chos kyi dbyings de'ang g.yo bar mi byed/ mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /des chos thams
cad kyang mtshan nyid med par rjes su rtogs pa yin te/ chos nyid de las kyang mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de mi gnas pa'i tshul du lus la legs par gnas pa yin no/ /ji
ltar legs par gnas she na/ lus 'di ni rtag tu lus ma yin pa zhes de ltar legs par gnas pa yin no/ /lus kyi chos nyid kyis thog ma dang / tha ma ma yin pa mnyam
par byed do/ /len par mi byed/ khyer bar mi byed par de ltar chos nyid de shes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gang bstan pa'i
chos de'ang rjes su thob pa yin no/ /chos thams cad la chags pa med pas dri ma med la dag pa'ang mi mthong ngo / /chos gang dag mi mthong ba de dag gang yang mi 'dzin to/ /chos
kyi dbyings 'di ni nyon mongs pa med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ rang bzhin med pa/ byed pa med pa/ dngos po med pa/ sems dang bral ba/ sems med pa zhes bstan to/ /gang la sems
mi dmigs pa de sems med pa/ thob pa med pa/ nye bar zhi ba zhes brjod do/ /de tha snyad med pa/ tha snyad dang bral ba/ dmigs pa med pa ste/ de 'dzin kyang chos nyid dngos po
med pa'i phyir/ gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin te/ chos nyid des rab tu phye'o/ /chos nyid 'di ni bden par na byang chub sems dpa' la bstan te/ bsres pa'ang med/ rnam par
gtor ba'ang med/ bkag pa'ang med do/ /de la bsnyad pa 'di ni 'gyur ba med pa ste/ de ltar bsnyad pa de ltar thob pas na rigs kyis zhes brjod do/ /de thob pas rigs kyis
zhes yongs su bstan to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rigs kyis 'di'ang rjes su thob pa yin te/ chos phra rab tsam yang 'ong ba'am/ 'gro bar yang dag
par rjes su mi mthong la/ 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa'i chos thams cad kyang 'dzin cing g.yo bar mi byed/ rnam par 'thor bar mi byed/ 'du bar mi byed la gtor ba
med pa dang / 'dzin pa med pa'i chos kyang 'dzin te/ des na chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o/ /chos nyid thob pa dang / chos thams cad thob pa med pas chos kyi rjes su 'brang
ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ba stsal to/ /sangs rgyas chos la rnam kun tu/ /chos las ldog par mi byed cing / /chos
nyid 'di dag 'dzin byed de/ /de phyir chos rjes 'brang zhes gsungs/ /chos rgyun bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /rgyun de las kyang 'da' mi byed/ /chos nyid de
ni rjes su thob/ /de phyir chos rjes 'brang zhes gsungs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa'i chos/ /bsti stang byas te de dag 'dzin/ /de yi sems ni zhum pa med/ /de phyir chos rjes
'brang zhes gsungs/ /ngo bo nyid kyis chos kyi rgyun/ /rgyun de de yis kun tu bstan/ /chos la mngon par zhen pa med/ /de phyir chos 'brang shes par bya/ /gnas med pa dang rten med
pa'i| |chos kyi rgyun ni yang dag rtogs/ /chos nyid de ni 'dzin byed de/ /de phyir blo ldan chos rjes 'brang / /byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid gang / /sangs rgyas kyis ni bstan
mdzad pa/ /chos nyid de ni rjes su thob/ /de phyir blo ldan chos rjes 'brang / /dbyings ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong / /chos rnams kun la nges med pa/ /chos nyid de ni 'dzin par byed/ /
de phyir blo ldan chos rjes 'brang / /des ni chos rnams thams cad la/ /stong par brtags nas skyon ma mthong / /chos gang mthong bar ma gyur pa/ /de dag la ni 'dzin pa med/ /chos kyi
dbyings kyi dbyings 'di ni/ /nyon mongs med cing mtshan ma med/ /ngo bo nyid kyang med par bstan/ /de ni brjod med dngos po med/ /dbyings 'di sems dang bral ba ste/ /sems de
dmigs su med pa yin/ /gang phyir sems ni mi dmigs pa/ /de phyir de ni bsam yas brjod/ /sems pa med cing thob pa med/ /nye bar zhi bar brjod pa de/ /brjod pa med cing dmigs pa
med| |des na de ni bsam yas brjod/ /chos nyid 'di dag 'dzin byed la/ /de ni gang du'ang gnas pa med/ /dngos po med pas mi gnas te/ /de phyir chos rjes 'brang zhes gsungs/ /
byang chub sems dpa' de la ni/ /chos nyid 'di ni rab bstan te/ /bsres pa med cing bzhag pa med/ /'gyur ba med cing 'od gsal ba/ /gang las rigs ni rab brjod pa/ /de ni
'phags pa'i spyod yul te/ /de ni rab tu thos pas na/ /rigs kyi sar ni yongs su brjod/ /byang chub sems dpa' ma smad pa/ /rigs 'di dang ni rjes mthun pa/ /de ni de ltar 'dzin
byed pas/ /de phyir chos rjes 'brang zhes gsungs/ /chos nyid rab tu thab pas na/ /de chos rjes su 'brang bar 'dod/ /kun dga' 'di las dgongs nas ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab
tu brjod/ /chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes/ /ngas ni dgongs te 'di bshad do/ /gang dag byang chub ring 'du shes/ /de dag de ltar nye bar khrid/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i chos/ /
mang po dag ni ngas bshad de/ /de lta bu yi thabs kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu bstan/ /kun dga' bo/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar yongs su bstan to/ /kun dga' bo/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad par yongs su bstan ce na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di la byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni log pa nyid brgyad las shin tu 'das pa yin te/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la reg cing yang dag pa nyid brgyad la mngon par zhen pa'ang med pa yin/
so so'i skye bo'i chos las shin tu 'das pa yin/ lam la'ang legs par gnas pa yin te/ bar ma nyid thob pa yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos las kyang 'das la/ sangs rgyas kyi
theg pa la mngon du zhugs pa'ang yin zhing byang chub de'ang mi rnyed/ log par lta ba las kyang shin tu 'das shing yang dag par lta ba'ang rnam par bshig pa yin/ mnyan pa
nyid rjes su thob cing 'jig tshogs las rnam par 'das pa yin/ byang chub du mngon du zhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi lam rjes su thob pa yin/ de sems can du 'du shes pa bzlog
pa yin| de sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa rnam par bshig pa yin/ 'du shes mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob pa yin/ sems can gyi gnas las shin tu 'das pa yin/ gnas
med pa la'ang mngon du zhugs la chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'ang yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang dag de'i gnas su 'gyur ba'i chos de dag mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /'jig rten
pa'i chos rnams las rab tu 'das shing / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la zhugs la/ 'gog pa'i dbyings dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa thob pa yin/ 'jig rten pa rnams
dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing / chos rnams dang / chos ma yin pa rnams dang / yod pa dang / med pa rnam par spangs pa yin/ de chad pa dang / rtag pa
la mtshungs par 'du shes pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems la mtshungs par gyur pa yin/ byang chub kyi sems de'ang mi dmigs pa yin no/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad mtshungs par gyur pa mnyam pa nyid du des shes pa yin te/ des na de'i lus la dug dang / me dang mtshon gyis mi tshugs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des
yul thams cad kyang rnam par spangs pa yin la/ de'i rtogs pa sangs rgyas kyi yul la'ang legs par gnas pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni 'gro ba med pa/ 'ong ba
med pa| bde ba/ zhi ba/ grangs su ma gtogs pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin de la legs par gnas pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni stong pa'o/ /de ltar na de'i gnas de med
pa yin te/ de na de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi reg mi phog ste/ des na mi gsod pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar nges par 'byung ba ni mi gsod pa yin te/ des bde
bar bde ba'i shes pa rtogs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des gang gis rtogs pa'i shes pa de'ang mi rnyed de/ des na de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs mi phog go /de ci'i phyir zhe
na| de chos thams cad 'dre ba med par shes pa'i phyir te/ des na de mtshon gyis mi gsod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed
de| byang chub kyi rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa'i byams pa dang / rnam pa med cing chags pa med pa'i byams pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / zhi ba'i dbyings ma thob
pa'i byams pa dang / gnod sems dang / brnab sems spangs pa'i byams pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes kyis btang ba'i byams pa dang / byang chub snang ba
thob pa'i byams pa dang / sems can mi dmigs pa'i byams pa des sems can thams cad la khyab par byed de/ des na de mtshon gyis mi gsod do/ /chos kyi dbyings
mnyam pa nyid kyis des 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mnyam pa nyid du shes pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po ni/ byang chub 'gyur ba med pa dang / rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa dang / kun tu rtog pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / rnyog pa med pa de ltar chos kyi dbyings mnyam
pa nyid la zhugs so/ /sgrar brjod pa gang dag ji snyed pa thams cad la rtogs pa dang / rtogs pa med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa med pa dang / gnas pa med par rtogs pa khong
du chud par 'gyur te/ sgra thams cad la mkhas pa yin/ nges pa'i tshig med pa'i chos ston par byed la/ bdag ni chos 'ga' zhig ston to snyam du rlom sems pa'ang med do/ /de
'du shes dang yang bral la sgra thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la'ang 'jug go /chos thams cad bral ba'ang med la/ stong pa dang / zhi bar yang shes so/ /de gang las 'da' bar bya
ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs te/ des na de brgyad pa zhes bya'o/ /chos thams cad la mi chags pas/ des na brgyad pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs
su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /log pa brgyad las shin tu 'das/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad la reg /yang dag brgyad la zhen pa med/ /de phyir brgyad pa zhes brjod do/ /so
so'i skye bo'i chos las 'das/ /lam la'ang rab tu legs par gnas/ /ye shes ldan pa dbus mi mthong / /de phyir brgyad pa zhes brjod do/ /so so'i skye bo nyid las 'das/
byang chub la yang mngon par zhugs/ /byang chub de yang mi dmigs te/ /des na brgyad pa zhes brjod do/ /log pa'i lta las rnam par 'das/ /yang dag lta
ba rnam par bshig /bzang po'i lam gyi mnyam nyid 'thob/ /des na brgyad pa zhes brjod do/ /'jig tshogs las ni rnam par 'das/ /byang chub mchog la rab tu zhugs/ /sangs
rgyas lam yang rjes su thob/ /des na brgyad pa zhes brjod do/ /de ni rang gi 'du shes bzlog /byang chub 'du shes rnam par bshig /dpe med pa yi 'du shes thob/ /des na brgyad
pa zhes brjod do/ /sems can gnas las shin tu 'das/ /gnas med pa la rab tu zhugs/ /chos rnams kun la mi gnas te/ /des na brgyad pa zhes brjod do/ /'jig rten chos
las rnam par 'das/ /'phags pa'i chos ni rnam par bshig /'gog pa'i dbyings ni rjes su thob/ /des na brgyad pa zhes brjod do/ /gang dag 'jig rten chos brjod dang / /
sangs rgyas chos gang tha dad pa/ /chos de de yis mi rnyed de/ /des na brgyad pa zhes brjod do/ /yod ces pa 'di mtha' gcig ste/ /med ces bya ba gnyis pa yin/ /mtha'
'di de yis rnam par spangs/ /des na brgyad ba zhes brjod do/ /de ni bdag dang bdag med mtshungs/ /rtag pa dang ni chad pa mtshungs/ /de yis mnyam nyid mtshungs par shes//
des na brgyad pa zhes brjod do/ /'das pa'i sems ni mi rnyed de/ /ma 'ongs sems kyang de bzhin no/ /da ltar byung la mnyam par thob/ /des na brgyad pa zhes brjod do/ /byang chub tu ni dang
po sems/ /dge ba skyes pa gang yin pa/ /sems de dmigs pa ma yin na/ /de yis ji ltar byang chub thob/ /gang la byang chub mi dmigs pa/ /de ni de ltar mi dmigs zhugs/ /des na de
la dug dang mes/ /rnam pa kun tu mi tshugs so/ /de ni 'gro dang bral ba ste/ /mtshan ma yis ni chags pa med/ /'gro ba med pa'i 'gro bar phyin/ /des na brgyad pa zhes brjod do/ /byang
chub 'gro dang bral ba ste/ /de ni tshig gis rab tu brjod/ /des na sgra yang rnam par bshig /des na brgyad pa zhes brjod do/ /de la 'gro ba mi rnyed de/ /de la 'gro ba med mi rnyed/ /mi 'gro
ba dang 'gro ba'i sgra/ /ye shes zhi bar rab tu bstan/ /zhi ba de ni bde bar brjod/ /zhi ba stong pa nyid du brjod/ /zhi ba'i dbyings ni thob pas na/ /des na de gsad min zhes brjod/ /blo
ldan des ni bde bar yang / /de ltar bde ba'i shes pa rtogs/ /de yis ci yang ma bor te/ /des na de ni gsad min 'dod/ /legs par thar byas mtshon rnon gyis/ /de yi lus la mi
phog ste| |de lus lus kyi 'du shes med/ /des na mtshon gyis mi gsod do/ /des pa byang chub byams pa yi/ /byams pas sems can khyab par byed/ /blo ldan gnod sems rnam par
spangs/ /des na mtshon gyis mi gsod do/ /ma rig 'du shes ngan pa bsal/ /rig pa dang ni 'du shes btang / /byang chub phyir ni snang ba thob/ /des na mtshon
gyis mi gsod do/ /mtshor la'ang stong par mos pa ste/ /lus kyi 'du shes rnam par bshig /byang chub lam ni rjes su thob/ /des na mtshon gyis mi gsod do/ /zhi ba'i dbyings
ni rjes su thob/ /ngan song thams cad rnam par spangs/ /de ni sdig pa'i las las 'das/ /des na mtshon gyis mi gsod do/ /'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs khams dang / /gzugs
med pa yang rnam kun tu/ /khams gsum pa ni mnyam par shes/ /des na brgyad pa zhes brjod do/ /chos kyi dbyings mnyam byang chub ni/ /'gyur pa med cing bstan du med/ /shes
bya ma yin kun rtog med/ /spros pa med cing rnyog pa med/ /byang chub sems dpa' ma smad pa/ /de ltar mnyam pa nyid la zhugs/ /gang dag ji snyed sgrar brjod pa/ /de la 'gro
bas 'gro mi byed/ /gang gis chos rnams rab bshad pa/ /skad rnams kun la mkhas pa yin/ /bdag gi 'ga' zhig bshad do zhes/ /de la rlom sems ci yang med/ /sgra
rnams kun las shin tu 'das/ /sgra med pa yi chos nyid rtogs/ /des na brgyad pa zhes brjod do/ /sgra rnams kun la nges pa med/ /kun dga' ngas ni 'di la dgongs/ /brgyad
pa yongs su brjod pa yin/ /de ltar de skad brjod pa 'di/ /'di ni de ltar yod ma yin/ /kun dga' bo/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad par yongs su bstan to/ /kun dga' bo/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyun du zhugs par yongs su bstan ce na/ kun dga' bo/ lam la rgyun zhes brjod de/ /sangs rgyas kyi lam bsam gyis mi khyab
pa'o| |de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'du ba med pa dang / bral ba med pa dang / chos thams cad las bsgral ba'i tshul gyis
gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi rgyun rjes su thob cing de la gzhol te/ chos thams cad gzung ba med pa/ gnas pa med pa/ dmigs pa med pa/ rten pa med pa/ dngos po med
pa| chos thams cad yongs su grub pa med pa'i lam de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su thob ste/ brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / mthu brtan pa dang /
blo gros brtan pa dang ldan pa yin gyi/ le lo dang / brtson 'grus dang mi mthun pa dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /lam de la'ang mi chags shing mi gnas la la ma des kyang chos
thams cad tshol te/ ji ltar de la chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid dang / sgrib pa dang / chod pa rnams kyis mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad dang /
sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba rnam par mthong bas lta ba skyed pa med pa sangs rgyas kyi lta ba bskyed par 'gyur ba
dang / 'jig tshogs kyi 'du shes rnam par bshig pa dang / bdag gi 'du shes las shin tu 'das pa de ltar tshol te/ des na de rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /de sangs rgyas
kyi lam la'ang mi chags te/ chags pa med pa rjes su thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la the tshom med do/ /tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa'ang med do/ de sangs rgyas kyi
tshul khrims kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas des na tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa med do/ /brtags pa'i tshul khrims ma yin no/ /rnam par brtag pa'i tshul
khrims ma yin no/ /kun tu sbyor ba gsum las rnam par 'das so/ /khams gsum pa la mi gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi la ma rjes su thob ste/ dmigs pa med pa'i lam/ chags
pa med pa'i lam/ chags pa thams cad dang bral ba sangs rgyas kyi lam la mngon du zhugs so/ /lus dang srog la mi lta'o/ /gtong ba thams cad yongs su gtong ngo / /
bzhin khro gnyer med do/ /byang chub la brtsams te sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las bsgral ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod pa dang / mtshan ma thams
cad rnam par gzhig pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i chos bskyed pa'i phyir de yongs su mi gtong ba ci'ang med do/ /de sems can gyi 'du shes dang bral bas 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba na
bag tsha ba med pa yin te/ byang chub kyi lam rnam par spyod pa zhi ba'i chos ston to/ /'jigs shing skrag pa dang bral bas 'chi bas kyang 'jigs pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
ltar des zhi ba'i lam rjes su thob pa'i phyir te/ sangs rgyas kyi lam 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bde ba 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa'i lam zhes bya ba thams cad rnam par
'jig pa mnyam pa'i lam/ spros pa med pa rjes su thob bo/ /des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /lam la rgyun ces ngas brjod de/ /bsam du med pa sangs rgyas lam/ /gang dag la lar 'dir gnas pa/ /de dang de dag
rgyun la gzhol/ /lam ni nam mkha' mtshungs pa ste/ /chos rnams kun la gnas pa med/ /dmigs pa med cing brten pa med/ /de la dngos po yod ma yin/ /'jig rten mgon
po bla na med/ /lam gang gis ni nges 'byung ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' dran brtan des/ /lam de nyid ni rjes su thob/ /lam de la ni chags med la/ /lam
gyis kyang ni tshol bar byed/ /des na de ni rgyun du zhugs/ /sangs rgyas lam la chags pa med/ /'khor ba'i 'du shes gang brjod pa/ /sangs rgyas 'du shes de bzhin te/ /mnyam
pa nyid ni der zhugs pa/ /rgyun du zhugs par shes par gyis/ /sangs rgyas lam ni mthong ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni lam 'di la/ /sgrib cing chod pa yod pa rnams/ /thams cad
de yis rnam par spangs/ /bdag gi lus su bsams nas ni/ /rgyal ba la yang lta ba skyed/ /sangs rgyas lta bar gang gyur pa/ /lta ba de ni de yis bsal/ /bdag tu lta ba rab
sdeg pa| |bdag lta 'jig tshogs lta ba gang / /lta de de yis rnam par bshig /des na lam la mi chags so/ /byang chub thob phyir sngon chad ni/ /de yi the tshom gyur pa gang / /
de bsal bas ni chags med thob/ /sangs rgyas lam la rab tu zhugs/ /gang gis de yi tshul khrims dang / /sangs rgyas tshul khrims mchog 'dzin rgyur/ /tshul khrims 'du
shes de spangs te/ /phyir yang de la rtog mi byed/ /kun tu sbyor ba gsum bcad cing / /khams gsum pa la de mi gnas/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rjes su thob/ /sems can
'du shes rnam par bshig /dmigs pa med pa'i lam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub phyir zhugs te/ /rnyog pa med pa sangs rgyas lam/ /zhi ba'i lam ni rjes su thob/ /gtong ba la
ni mos pa yin/ /bzhin ni khro gnyer med pa ste/ /des na de la 'tshe byed med/ /byang chub phyir ni de spros med/ /de la mi gtong ci yang med/ /sdug bsngal las ni skye dgu sgrol/ /des
na rgyun du zhugs pa de/ /thar mchog la ni dgod par byed/ /de la mtshan ma phyir zhing med/ /gang du'ang mtshan ma med pa'ang min/ /des na 'jig rten 'di dang ni/ /gzhan du'ang de
la 'jigs pa med/ /gang dag chos dang chos min dang / /gnyi ga de dag rnam par spangs/ /ming dang gzugs dang bral bas na/ /de ni 'jig rten 'dir mi 'jigs/ /'khor gyi
nang na 'gro ba na/ /rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa yin/ /byang chub lam ni rnam sbyong ba/ /zhi ba'i chos ni rab tu ston/ /de yi sems can 'du shes gang / /de yi 'du shes de rnams
bshig /des na de la sgrib pa med/ /'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bshig /'jigs pa'i rtsa ba spangs pas na/ /de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med/ /bde ba dri med 'dod chags
bral| |zhi ba'i lam ni rjes su thob/ /ngan 'gro yi ni mnyam nyid shes/ /de phyir de ni des mi 'jigs/ /gzung med mnyam nyid g.yo ba med/ /lam de yang dag rab bshad
pa| |byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yin/ /rgyun du zhugs zhes ngas bshad pa/ /chos rnams sems can gang dag ni/ /dman mos de dag phyir bshad do/ /
shin tu phra ba'i thabs kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu bshad/ /gang dag byang chub phyir 'jug pa/ /de dag de ltar nye bar khrid/ /sangs rgyas chos ni tshol gang gis/ /sngon
chad ji ltar spyad pa ltar/ /thabs dang ye shes brtan nas ni/ /rnam par 'dren pa chos ston to/ /kun dga' ngas ni 'di la dgongs/ /rgyun du zhugs par rab bshad na/ /sems
can blo chung rnams kyis ni/ /gzhan du yongs su de brtags so/ /kun dga' ba de ltar dgongs pa 'dis/ /nga yis rgyun du zhugs bshad pa/ /sems can gang dag blo ldan pa//
de dag gis ni tshul 'di shes/ /zab mo la ni mi mkhas pa/ /mi gsal byis pa'i blo ldan pa/ /ldem po dag ni mi shes te/ /mi shes pas na rtsod par byed/ /nga yis chos
stong mang po dag/ rgyun du zhugs par bshad pa dag/ rgyun du zhugs zhes bya ba'i sgra/ /sangs rgyas chos su bshad pa yin/ /kun dga' bo/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyun du zhugs par yongs su bstan to/ /kun dga' bo/
ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lan gcig phyir 'ong bar yongs su bstan ce na/ kun
dga' bo/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de yi rjes su 'gro ste/ shes pa gang gis byang chub sgrub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rkyen mang pos yongs su tshol lo/ /rkyen thams
cad kun tu gcod pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kun du tshol lo/ /bsam gtan mkha' khyab bsam gtan thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba nyon mongs pa thams cad
sel ba yongs su tshol lo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir chos nyid thams cad rjes su thob bo/ /gang de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gnas brnyes pa ma thob pa'i chos nyid yongs su tshol lo/ /de g.yo bar byed pa'i sems can gang
yang mi dmigs te/ sems can g.yo ba med pas chos kyi dbyings yongs su tshol lo/ /kye ma sems can dag ni mang du blo chung ba dang / shin tu sdug bsngal ba dang / chos kyi dbyings
la mi mkhas pas nyam thag pa dag ste/ de dag chos kyi dbyings shes pa la dgod par bya'o/ /zhes sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su tshol lo/ /dbang po dang / stobs dang /
byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa khong du chud par
bya zhing sems can dag kyang khong du chud par bya'o zhes sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su tshol lo/ /ye shes gang gis byang chub rtogs par 'gyur zhes ye shes de
yongs su tshol lo/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa mi mnga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyan gang gis 'jig rten gyi don bya zhes mig gi shes pa de dang / ye shes gang gis
chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa thams cad kyi mchog yongs su tshol lo/ /ye shes gang gis sems can tshol ba'i ye shes de'ang mi rnyed do/ /chos thams cad
legs par gnas pa shes pa'i ye shes la dgod do zhes des na de 'dir 'ongs te/ 'ongs nas kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings tshol ba'i phyir/ sems can gyi khams
kyang mthong la khams de'ang mi rnyed de/ des na 'ong ngo / /sems can yongs su grub pa rnyed par lta ga la 'gyur te/ sems can yongs su grub par khong du chud pa med pas sems
can gyi khams yongs su shes pa yin no/ /gang gi phyir sems can kun tu bstan cing yongs su brjod pa de'ang mthong ngo / /sems can thams cad dang chos kyi dbyings rnam par
mthong nas/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhol bar mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi lam/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i lam/ sems can mi dmigs pa'i lam
sems can mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi lam mthong zhing 'di lta bu mtshungs pa med pa'i lam gyi ye shes 'dod chags dang bral ba/ dri ma med pa gtsang ba 'tshol lo/ /ye shes gang gis
de shes pa'i ye shes de'ang mi rnyed do/ /ye shes gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rab tu phye ba'i ye shes de rjes su thob nas de yongs su tshol zhing 'dir 'ongs te/ des na de lan gcig
phyir 'ong ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yas pa/ /ye shes rjes su de 'gro ste/ /sangs rgyas
ye shes tshol byed pas/ /des na de ni lan gcig 'ong / /gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba/ /rkyen rnams mang po rab gsungs pa/ /rkyen de shes par bya'o zhes/ /de dag tshol zhing 'ongs
pa yin| |bsam gtan nam mkha' khyab byed pa/ /nyon mongs thams cad sel ba mchog/ de yi ched du rab brtson te/ /de sgrub par ni 'ongs pa yin/ /thams cad mkhyen dang ldan
rnams kyis/ /chos nyid dam pa gang brnyes pa/ /bdag gis de thob bya'o zhes/ /de tshol bar ni 'ongs pa yin/ /dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings las ni/ /sems can gang yang mi bskyod
de| |de dag khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /de ni lan gcig 'ong bar zad/ /sems can mang po blo chung ba/ /sdug bsngal zhing ni nyam thag pa/ /de dag ye shes
dgod do zhes/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni ye shes tshol/ /byang chub yan lag dbang po stobs/ /bsam gtan rnam thar brjod pa rnams/ /de dag btsal ba'i don gyi phyir/ /sangs rgyas ye
shes tshol ba yin/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas bzhugs bzhugs pa/ /byang chub snying po tshol bar byed/ /de tshol bar ni 'ongs pas na/ /des na de ni lan gcig 'ong / /sangs rgyas spyan ni
sgrib mi mnga'/ /spyan 'di bla na med pa ste/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni tshol byed pas/ /des na de ni lan gcig 'ong / /ji ltar sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon/ /skyob pa rnams kyis btsal
ba ltar/ /de ni shes pa kun gyi mchog/ shes rab de ltar tshol bar byed/ /ye shes gang gis chos rnams kun/ /ji bzhin shes shing sems can de/ /mi dmigs de ltar de lam
'tshol/ /des na lam ni tshol ba yin/ /bla na med la 'god do zhes/ /shes pas sems can mang tshol lo/ /de dag tshol bar byed pas na/ /lan gcig phyir ni 'ong ba yin/ /
shes ldan 'ongs nas sems can gyi/ /khams ni bsam gyi mi khyab mthong / /sems can khams ni tshol bar byed/ /des na de ni lan gcig 'ong / /de ni khams gang tshol
byed pa/ /de la sems can yod min te/ /tshol ba la ni mi rnyed pas/ /des na de ni lan gcig 'ong / /de ni sems can chos kyi dbyings/ /rnam pa kun tu mi 'thob ste/ /gang gis sems can
snang 'gyur ba/ /khams de de yis yongs su shes/ /chos rnams ma lus gsob dang gsog/ snying po med par rnam par mthong / /mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas lam
yang tshol bar byed/ /ye shes de ni 'di 'dra ste/ /dri med gtsang zhing 'dod chags bral/ /ye shes gang gis shes 'gyur ba/ /ye shes de ni mi rnyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' ma smad pa/ /
sems can gang gis rab phye ba/ /gang gi phyir na de 'dir 'ongs/ /ye shes de ni rjes su thob/ /kun dga' de las dgongs nas ni/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong zhes bstan na/ /sems can blo
chung rnams kyis ni/ /de la log par yongs su brtags/ /kun dga' 'di las dgongs nas ni/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong zhes brjod de/ /sems can chen po brtson ldan rnams/ /tshul
'di de ltar shes pa yin/ /dgongs la mkhas shing rnam rig pa/ /zab mo'i don la rab nges pa/ /don de rjes su thob nas su/ /de dag byang chub sgrub par byed/ /kun dga' bo/ de
ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lan gcig phyir 'ong bar yongs su bstan to/ /
kun dga' bo/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir
mi 'ong bar yongs su bstan ce na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyogs gcig pa'i spyod pa las yang dag par 'das shing sangs rgyas
kyi spyod pa rjes su thob pa yin/ des spyod pa thams cad spangs shing rnam par spangs pa yin/ chos thams cad la mi gnas shing gnas med pa dang / rten med pa yin te/ des na
de phyir mi 'ong ngo / /de chos nyid kyis 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /so so'i skye bo rnams las kyang rnam par 'das la so so'i skye bo'i 'du shes kyang rnam
par spangs shing sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang rnam par bshig pa yin/ rten pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pa'ang yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni zhi ba'i dbyings rjes su
thob pa yin te/ de la ni so so'i skye bo'am/ 'jig rten gyi 'dren pa sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /ngan song las kyang rnam par 'das shing 'dod pa yang dag par chad do/ /lta bar
gyur pa yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir zas dang bral ba'i byang chub rjes su thob bo/ /lta bar byas pa drug cu rtsa gnyis la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir dngos po dang / dngos
po med pa dang bral lo/ /mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra'o/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes bzlog pa dang / 'du shes thams cad la mi 'jug par bya ba'i phyir des chos thams cad
dang / ngan song dang / dri ma rnam par sbyang ba byas so/ /bdud sdig can bcom mo/ /rgyags pa dang bral lo/ /ma rig pa'i zug rdu phyung ngo / /srid pa bskams so/ /des dga' ba'i 'dod
chags bsal ba byas so/ /nyon mongs pa rnams bsal to/ /'du shes thams cad bton to/ /mya ngan gyi zug rdu phyung ngo / /nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang bral lo/ /phung po yongs su shes
pa'i snang ba thob bo/ /des na de sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ye shes mnyam pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob bo/ /des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'dod pa'i
'dam gyi khams la mi chags par sngon gyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba rjes su thob bo/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis bzhag pa bsal ba med cing bsnan pa med pa'i gter sngon gyi sangs rgyas
kyi gter rjes su thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi theg pa sems can thams cad la go skabs yod pa/ gtso bo gong na med pa rjes su thob bo/ /thog pa med pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma thams
cad mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis the tshom thams cad chad pa zhi ba'i dbyings rjes su thob ste/ des na'ang de 'dir mi 'ong ngo / /kun dga' bo/ gzhan yang / sems can gang dag bzung
ba de dag byang chub la dgod do/ /zhes des de dag bkod do/ /ji ltar byang chub la bkod ce na/ sems can med par byang chub khong du chud par byas te/
sems can gyi 'du shes las bslang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des sems can gyi khams stong par shes so/ /stong pa gang yin pa de bsam du med pa ste/ sems can gyi 'du shes
dang bral lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sems can gyi khams nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs par stong pa dang / sems can dang bral ba dang / sems can dang bral
ba'ang ma yin par shes so/ /nam mkha'i khams de'ang nam mkha'i khams nyid du med de gnas pa med do/ /nam mkha'i khams de'ang nam mkha' nyid kyis stong ste/ sems
can gyi mtshan ma thams cad bcom pa'o/ /des mtshan ma med pa'i byang chub thob ste/ des sems can dang / nam mkha'i 'du shes dang bral lo/ /de chos kyi dbyings nam
mkha'i khams dang mtshungs par rtogs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad dang sems can thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis chos kyi dbyings so/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ 'di ltar des de dag mi dmigs te/ mi dmigs pas na'ang 'dir mi 'ong ngo / /des na de phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /chos thams cad du bgrang
ba'ang ma yin la sangs rgyas kyi grangs su'ang zhugs pas phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /phyogs gcig
spyod par gang yin par/ /de ni phyir zhing mi 'gro ste/ /phyogs gcig spyod pa spangs pas na/ /phyir mi 'ong zhes brjod pa yin/ /'gro ba rnams kyi 'gro med shes/ /gnas kyang cung zad
mi rnyed de/ /chos rnams kun la mi gnas pas/ /phyir mi 'ong zhes bya bar 'dod/ /so so'i skye bor gang brjod dang / /'jig rten mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /de la phyir zhing mi 'ong ste/
de phyir phyir mi 'ong zhes pa/ /'dir ni chos rnams 'ong ba dang / /'gro ba dag kyang mi dmigs te/ /'ong dang 'gro ba med thob pas/ /de ni phyir mi 'ong zhes brjod/ /'gro ba rnam gsum gang
du yang / /de ni phyir zhing mi 'gro ste/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams thob pas na/ /de ni phyir mi 'ong zhes brjod/ /'dod pa thams cad yang dag chad/ /de ni kha zas chags pa med/ /byang chub
lam yang thob pas na/ /phyir mi 'ong zhes brjod pa yin/ /sdig pa can gyi lta ba gang / /lta ba drug cu gnyis brjod pa/ /de la de ni mi 'gro ste/ /de phyir de ni phyir mi 'ong / /chos rnams
'di dag rang bzhin med/ /dngos po dang ni rtag tu bral/ /de yis yang dag ji bzhin shes/ /des na de ni 'dir mi 'ong / /nyon mongs thams cad sel byed pa/ /mya ngan 'das zhi gang
